GSP33brssbh2u:367: śrutiścātra bhavati- 'imāḥ sarvāḥ prajāḥ sati saṃpadya na viduḥ sati saṃpadyāmaha iti ta iha vyāghro vā siṃho vā vṛko vā varāho vā kīṭo vā
GSP33brssbh2u:368: pataṅgo vā daṃśo vā maśako vā yadyadbhavanti tadā bhavanti' (chā. 6.9.2,3) iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:371: svapnavadavyāhataḥ sthito dṛśyate, evamapītāvapi mithyājñānapratibaddhaiva vibhāgaśaktiranumāsyate
GSP33brssbh2u:374: yaḥ punarayamante 'paro vikalpa utprekṣito 'thedaṃ jagadapītāvapi vibhaktameva pareṇa brahmaṇāvatiṣṭheteti, so 'pyanabhyupagamādeva
GSP33brssbh2u:380: iha suṣupteḥ prāk prabodhe yena jātyādinā vibhaktā bhavanti tadā punarutthānakāle tathaiva bhavantīti vibhāgoktiḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:382: svapakṣe caite prativādinaḥ sādhāraṇā doṣāḥ prāduṣyuḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:388: tathā mṛditasarvaviśeṣeṣu vikāreṣvapītāvavibhāgātmatāṃ gateṣvidamasya puruṣasyopādānamidamasyeti prākpralayātpratipuruṣaṃ ye niyatā bhedā na te tathaiva punarutpatau niyantuṃ śakyante kāraṇābhāvāt vinaiva kāraṇena niyame 'bhyupagamyamāne kāraṇābhāvasāmyānmuktānāmapi punarbandhaprasaṅgaḥ
GSP33brssbh2u:390: ye nāpadyante teṣāṃ pradhānakāryatvaṃ na prāpnotītyevamete doṣāḥ sādhāraṇatvānnānyatarasminpakṣe codayitavyā bhavantītyadoṣatāmevaiṣāṃ draḍhayati /
GSP33brssbh2u:393: tarkāpratiṣṭhānād apy anyathānumeyam iti ced evam apy anirmokṣaprasaṅgaḥ |
GSP33brssbh2u:400: atha kasyacitprasiddhamāhātmyasya kapilasya cānyasya vā saṃmatastarkaḥ pratiṣṭhita ityāśrīyeta
GSP33brssbh2u:404: nahi pratiṣṭhitastarka eva nāstīti śakyate vaktum /
GSP33brssbh2u:408: atītavartamānādhvasāmyena hyanāgate 'pyadhvani sukhaduḥkhaprāptiparihārāya pravartamāno loko dṛśyate /
GSP33brssbh2u:409: śrutyarthavipratipattau cārthābhāsanirākaraṇena samyagarthanirdhāraṇaṃ tarkeṇaiva vākyavṛttinirūpaṇarūpeṇa kriyate /
GSP33brssbh2u:410: manurapi caivaṃ manyate- 'pratyakṣamanumānaṃ ca śāstraṃ ca vividhāgamam /
GSP33brssbh2u:418: nahi pūrvajo mūḍha āsīdityātmanāpi mūḍhena bhavitavyamiti kiñcidasti pramāṇam /
GSP33brssbh2u:419: tasmānna tarkāpratiṣṭhānaṃ doṣa iti cet, evamapyavimokṣaprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:420: yadyapi kvacidviṣaye tarkasya pratiṣṭhitatvamupalakṣyate tathāpi prakṛte tāvadviṣaye prasajyata evāpratiṣṭhitatvadoṣādanirmokṣastarkasya /
GSP33brssbh2u:422: rūpādyabhāvāddhi nāyamarthaḥ pratyakṣagocaraḥ, liṅgādyabhāvācca nānumānādīnāmiti cāvocāma
GSP33brssbh2u:426: loke tadviṣayaṃ jñānaṃ samyagjñānamityucyate yathāgniruṣṇā iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:429: yaddhi kenacittārkikeṇedameva samyagjñānamiti pratipāditaṃ tadapareṇa vyutthāpyate, tenāpi pratiṣṭhāpitaṃ tato 'pareṇa vyutthāpyata iti prasiddhaṃ loke /
GSP33brssbh2u:431: naca pradhānavādī tarkavidāmuttama iti sarvāstārkikaiḥ parigṛhīto yena tadīyaṃ mataṃ samyagjñānamiti pratipadyemahi /
GSP33brssbh2u:432: naca śakyante 'tītānāgatavartamānāstārkikā ekasmindeśe kāle ca samāhartuṃ yena tanmatirekarūpaikārthaviṣayā samyaṅmatiriti syāta /
GSP33brssbh2u:433: vedasya tu nityatve vijñānotpattihetutve ca sati vyavasthitārthaviṣayatvopapattestajjanitasya jñānasya samyaktvamatītānāgatavartamānaiḥ sarvairapi tārkikairapahnotumaśakyam /
GSP33brssbh2u:436: ata āgamavaśenāgamānusāritarkavaśena ca cetanaṃ brahmajagataḥ kāraṇaṃ prakṛtiśceti sthitam FN: tarkasya kaivalyamanugrāhyāgamarāhityam /
GSP33brssbh2u:444: vaidikasya darśanasya pratyāsannatvādgurutaratarkabalopetatvādvedānusāribhiśca kaiścicchiṣṭhaiḥ kenacidaṃśena parigṛhītatvātpradhānakāraṇavādaṃ tāvadvyapāśritya
GSP33brssbh2u:446: idānīmaṇvādivādavyapāśrayeṇāpi kaiścinmandamatibhirvedāntavākyeṣu punastarkanimitta ākṣepa āśaṅkyata ityataḥ pradhānamallanibarhaṇanyāyenātidiśati /
GSP33brssbh2u:447: parigṛhyanta iti parigrahāḥ na parigrahā aparigrahāḥ śiṣṭānāmaparigrahāḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:449: 'ṇvādikāraṇavādāste 'pi pratiṣiddhatayā vyākhyātā nirākṛtā draṣṭavyāḥ tulyatvānnirākaraṇakāraṇasya nātra punarāśaṅkitavyaṃ kiñcidasti /
GSP33brssbh2u:456: yadyapi śrutiḥ pramāṇaṃ svaviṣaye bhavati tathāpi pramāṇāntareṇa viṣayāpahāre 'nyaparā bhavitumarti
GSP33brssbh2u:461: kathaṃ punaḥ pramāṇāntaraprasiddhor'thaḥ śrutyā bādhyata iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:462: atrocyate- prasiddho hyayaṃ bhoktṛbhogyavibhāgo loke bhoktā cetanaḥ śārīro bhogyāḥ śabdādayo viṣayā iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:463: yathā bhoktā devadatto bhojya odana iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:464: tasya ca vibhāgasyābhāvaḥ prasajyeta yadi bhoktā bhogyabhāvamāpadyeta /
GSP33brssbh2u:471: upapadyata evāyamasmatpakṣe 'pi vibhāgaḥ evaṃ loke dṛṣṭatvāt /
GSP33brssbh2u:476: evamihāpi naca bhoktṛbhogyayoritaretarabhāvāpattiḥ, naca parasmādbrahmaṇo 'nyatvaṃ bhaviṣyati
GSP33brssbh2u:478: 'tatsṛṣṭvā tadevānuprāviśat' (tai. 2.6) iti sraṣṭurevāvikṛtasya kāryānupraveśena bhoktṛtvaśravaṇāt, tathāpi kāryamanupraviṣṭasyāstyupādhinimitto vibhāga ākāśasyeva ghaṭādyupādhinimitta ityataḥ paramakāraṇabrahmaṇo 'nanyatvaṃ'pyupapadyate
GSP33brssbh2u:486: abhyupagamya cemaṃ vyāvahārikaṃ bhoktṛbhogyalakṣaṇaṃ vibhāgaṃ syāllokavaditi parihāroṣa'bhihitaḥ
GSP33brssbh2u:494: somyaikena mṛtpiṇḍena sarvaṃ mṛnmayaṃ vijñātaṃ syādvācārambhaṇaṃ vikāro nāmadheyaṃ mṛttiketyeva satyam' (chā. 6.1.1) iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:495: etaduktaṃ bhavati- ekena mṛtpiṇḍena paramārthato mṛdātmanā vijñātena sarvaṃ mṛnmayaṃ ghaṭaśarāvodañcanādikaṃ mṛdātmakatvāviśeṣādvijñātaṃ bhavet /
GSP33brssbh2u:496: yato vācārambhaṇaṃ vikāro nāmadheyaṃ vācaiva kevalamastītyārabhyate /
GSP33brssbh2u:501: tatra śrutādvācārambhaṇaśabdāddārṣṭāntike 'pi brahmavyatirekeṇa kāryajātasyābhāva iti gamyate
GSP33brssbh2u:502: punaśca tejobannānāṃ brahmakāryatāmuktvā tejobannakāryāṇāṃ tejobannavyatirekeṇābhāvaṃ bravīti- 'apāgādagneragnitvaṃ vācārambhaṇaṃ vikāro nāmadheyaṃ trīṇi rūpāṇītyeva satyam' (chā. 6.4.1) ityādinā /
GSP33brssbh2u:513: yathā vṛkṣa ityanekatvaṃ śākhā iti nānātvam /
GSP33brssbh2u:517: nānātvāṃśena tu karmakāṇḍāśrayau laukikavaidikavyavahārau setsyata iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:522: dārṣṭāntike 'pi 'aitadātmyamidaṃ sarvaṃ tatsatyam' iti ca paramakāraṇasyaivaikasya satyatvāvadhāraṇāt 'sa ātmā tattvamasi śvetaketo'
GSP33brssbh2u:524: svayaṃ prasiddhaṃ hyetaccharīrasya brahmātmatvamupadiśyate na yatnāntaraprasādhyam /
GSP33brssbh2u:525: ataścedaṃ śāstrīyaṃ brahmātmatvamavagamyamānaṃ svābhāvikasya śārīrātmatvasya bādhakaṃ saṃpadyate, rajjvādibuddhaya iva sarpādibuddhīnām
GSP33brssbh2u:526: bādhite ca śārīrātmatvasya tadāśrayaḥ samastaḥ svābhāviko vyavahāro bādhito bhavati yatprasiddhaye nānātvāṃśo 'paro brahmaṇaḥ kalpyeta /
GSP33brssbh2u:528: 'yatra tvasya sarvamātmaivābhūttatkena kaṃ paśyet' (bṛ. 4.5.15) ityādinā brahmātmatvadarśinaṃ prati samastasya kriyākārakaphalalakṣaṇasya vyavahārasyābhāvam /
GSP33brssbh2u:529: nacāyaṃ vyavahārābhāvoṣa'vasthāviśeṣanibaddho 'bhidhīyata iti yuktaṃ vaktum, 'tattvamasi' iti brahmātmabhāvasyānavasthāviśeṣanibandhanatvāt /
GSP33brssbh2u:530: taskaradṛṣṭāntena cānṛtābhisaṃdhasya bandhanaṃ satyābhisaṃdhasya ca mokṣaṃ darśayannekatvamevaikaṃ pāramārthikaṃ darśayati (chā. 6.16) /
GSP33brssbh2u:532: ubhayasatyatāyāṃ hi kathaṃ vyavahāragocaro 'pi janturanṛtābhisaṃdha ityucyeta /
GSP33brssbh2u:533: 'mṛtyoḥ sa mṛtyumāpnoti ya iha nāneva paśyati' (bṛ. 4.4.19) iti ca bhedadṛṣṭimapavadannevaitaddarśayati
GSP33brssbh2u:534: nacāsmindarśane jñānānmokṣa ityupapadyate, samyagjñanāpanodyasya kasyacinmithyājñānasya saṃsārakāraṇatvenānabhyupagamāt
GSP33brssbh2u:545: vikārāneva tvahaṃ mametyavidyāyāmātmīyena bhāvena sarvo jantuḥ pratipadyate svābhāvikīṃ brahmātmatāṃ hitvā /
GSP33brssbh2u:547: yathā suptasya prākṛtasya janasya svapna uccāvacānbhāvānpaśyato niścitameva pratyakṣābhimataṃ vijñānaṃ bhavati prākprabodhāt, naca pratyakṣābhāsābhiprāyastatkāle bhavati, tadvat /
GSP33brssbh2u:548: kathaṃ tvasatyena vedāntavākyena satyasya brahmātmatvasya pratipattirupapadyeta /
GSP33brssbh2u:555: tatra brūmaḥ- yadyapi svapnadarśanāvasthasya sarpadaṃśanodakasnānādikāryamanṛtaṃ tathāpi tadavagatiḥ satyameva phalaṃ,
GSP33brssbh2u:557: nahi svapnādutthitaḥ svapnadṛṣṭaṃ sarpadaṃśanodakasnānādikāryaṃ mithyeti manyamānastadavagatimapi mithyeti manyate kaścit /
GSP33brssbh2u:559: tathāca śrutiḥ - 'yadā karmasu kāmyeṣu striyaṃ svapneṣu paśyati /
GSP33brssbh2u:560: samṛddhiṃ tatra jānīyāttasminsvapnanidarśane' (chā. 5.2.9) ityasatyena svapnadarśanena satyāyāḥ samṛddheḥ pratipattiṃ darśayati /
GSP33brssbh2u:561: tathā pratyakṣadarśaneṣu keṣucidariṣṭeṣu jāteṣu 'na ciramiva jīviṣyatīti vidyāt' ityuktvā 'atha svapnāḥ puruṣaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ kṛṣṇadantaṃ paśyati sa enaṃ
GSP33brssbh2u:562: hanti' ityādinā tena tenāsatyenaiva svapnadarśanena satyaṃ maraṇaṃ sūcyata iti darśayati /
GSP33brssbh2u:563: prasiddhaṃ cedaṃ loke 'nvayavyatirekakuśalānāmīdṛśena svapnadarśanena sādhvāgamaḥ sūcyata īdṛśenāsādhvāgama iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:565: apicāntyamidaṃ pramāṇamātmaikatvasya pratipādakaṃ nātaḥ paraṃ kiñcidākāṅkṣyamasti /
GSP33brssbh2u:566: yathāhi loke yajetetyukte kiṃ kena kathamityākāṅkṣyate naivaṃ 'tattvamasi'
GSP33brssbh2u:571: na ceyamavagatirnopapadyata iti śakyaṃ vaktum, 'taddhāsya vijajñau' (chā.
GSP33brssbh2u:573: avagatisādhanānāṃ ca śravaṇādīnāṃ vedānuvacanādīnāṃ ca vidhānāt /
GSP33brssbh2u:577: tasmādantyena pramāṇena pratipādita ātmaikatve samastasya prācīnasya bhedavyavahārasya bādhitatvānnānekātmakabrahmakalpanāvakāśo 'sti /
GSP33brssbh2u:579: pariṇāmino hi mṛdādayor'thā loke samadhigatā iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:582: eṣa neti netyātmā' (bṛ. 3.9.23), 'asthūlamanaṇu' (bṛ. 3.8.8) ityādyābhyaḥ sarvavikriyāpratiṣedhaśrutibhyo brahmaṇaḥ kūṭasthatvāvagamāt /
GSP33brssbh2u:583: nahyekasya brahmaṇaḥ pariṇāmadharmatvaṃ tadrahitatvaṃ ca śkyaṃ pratipattum
GSP33brssbh2u:589: naca yathā brahmaṇa ātmaikatvadarśanaṃ mokṣasādhanamevaṃ jagadākārapariṇāmitvadarśanamapi svatantrameva kasmaicitphalāyābhipreyate
GSP33brssbh2u:591: kūṭasthabrahmātmavijñānādeva hi phalaṃ darśayati śāstram- 'sa eṣa neti netyātmā' ityupakramya 'abhayaṃ vai janaka prāpto 'si' (bṛ. 4.2.4)
GSP33brssbh2u:593: tatraitatsiddhaṃ bhavati- brahmaprakaraṇe sarvadharmaviśeṣarahitabrahmadarśanādeva phalasiddhau satyāṃ yattatrāphalaṃ śrūyate brahmaṇo jagadākārapariṇāmitvādi tadbrahmadarśanopāyatvenaiva viniyujyate, phalavatsaṃnidhāvaphalaṃ tadaṅgamitivat /
GSP33brssbh2u:595: nahi pariṇāmavattvavijñānātpariṇāmavattvamātmanaḥ phalaṃ syāditi vaktuṃ yuktaṃ, kūṭasthanityatvānmokṣasya
GSP33brssbh2u:599: 'tasmādvā etasmādātmana ākāśaḥ saṃbhūtaḥ' (tai. 2.1) ityādivākyebhyo nityaśuddhabuddhamuktasvarūpātsarvajñātsarvaśakterīśvarājjagajjanisthi tipralayā nācetanātpradhānādanyasmādvetyeṣor'thaḥ pratijñātaḥ 'janmādyasya
GSP33brssbh2u:601: sā pratijñā tadavasthaiva na tadviruddhor'thaḥ punarihocyate /
GSP33brssbh2u:604: sarvajñasyeśvarasyātmabhūta ivāvidyākalpite nāmarūpe tattvānyatvābhyāmanirvacanīye saṃsāraprapañcabījabhūte sarvajñasyeśvarasya māyāśaktiḥ prakṛtiriti ca śrutismṛtyorabhilapyete /
GSP33brssbh2u:605: tābhyāmanyaḥ sarvajña īśvaraḥ 'ākāśo vai nāma nāmarūpayornirvahitā te yadantarā tadbrahma' (chā. 8.14.1) iti śruteḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:607: kṛtvābhivadanyadāste' (tai. ā. 3.12.7), 'ekaṃ bījaṃ bahudhā yaḥ karoti'
GSP33brssbh2u:610: sa ca svātmabhūtāneva ghaṭākāśasthānīyānavidyāpratyupasthāpitanāmarūpakṛtakāryakaraṇasaṃghātānurodhino jīvākhyānvijñānātmanaḥ pratīṣṭe vyavahāraviṣaye /
GSP33brssbh2u:611: tadevamavidyātmakopādhiparicchedāpekṣameveśvarasyeśvaratvaṃ sarvajñatvaṃ sarvaśaktitvaṃ ca na paramārthato vidyāyāpāstasarvopādhisvarūpa ātmanīśitrīśitavyasarvajñatvādivyavahāra upapadyate /
GSP33brssbh2u:612: tathācoktam- 'yatra nānyatpaśyati nānyacchṛṇoti nānyadvijānāti sa bhūmā'
GSP33brssbh2u:615: evaṃ paramārthāvasthāyāṃ sarvavyavahārābhāvaṃ vadanti vedāntāḥ sarve /
GSP33brssbh2u:616: tatheśvaragītāsvapi- 'na kartṛtvaṃ na karmāṇi lokasya sṛjati prabhuḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:618: nādatte kasyacitpāpaṃ na caiva sukṛtaṃ vibhuḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:619: ajñānenāvṛtaṃ jñānaṃ tena muhyanti jantavaḥ' (gī. 5.14.-15) iti paramārthāvasthāyāmīśitrīśitavyādivyavahārābhāvaḥ pradarśyate /
GSP33brssbh2u:620: vyavahārāvasthāyāṃ tūktaḥ śrutāvapīśvarādivyavahāraḥ 'eṣa sarveśvara eṣa bhūtādhipatireṣa bhūtapāla eṣa seturvidhāraṇa eṣāṃ lokānāmasaṃbhedāya'
GSP33brssbh2u:625: vyavahārābhiprāyeṇa tu syāllokavaditi mahāsamudrasthānīyatāṃ brahmaṇaḥ kathayati /
GSP33brssbh2u:626: apratyākhyāyaiva kāryaprapañcaṃ pariṇāmaprakriyāṃ cāśrayati saguṇopāsaneṣūpayokṣyata iti // FN: dṛṣṭaṃ prātītikaṃ naṣṭhamanityaṃ yatsvarūpaṃ tadrūpeṇānupākhyatvātsattāsphūrtiśūnyatvādananyatvamiti saṃbandhaḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:632: rekhāsvakāratvādibhrāntyā satyā akārādayo jñāyanta iti prasiddham /
GSP33brssbh2u:634: itaśca kāraṇādananyatvaṃ kāryasya, yatkāraṇaṃ bhāva eva kāraṇasya
GSP33brssbh2u:636: tadyathā satyāṃ mṛdi ghaṭa upalabhyate satsu ca tantuṣu paṭaḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:644: atha dhūmaṃ kayācidavasthayā viśiṃṣyādīdṛśo dhūmo nāsatyāgnau bhavatīti /
GSP33brssbh2u:645: naivamapi kaściddoṣaḥ tadbhāvānuraktāṃ hi buddhiṃ kāryakāraṇayorananyatve hetuṃ vayaṃ vadāmaḥ
GSP33brssbh2u:652: tantusaṃsthāne paṭe tantuvyatirekeṇa paṭo nāma kāryaṃ naivopalabhyate kevalāstu tantava ātānavitānavantaḥ pratyakṣamupalabhyante, tathā
GSP33brssbh2u:654: anayā pratyakṣopalabdhyā lohitaśuklakṛṣṇāni trīṇi tato rūpāṇi vāyumātramākāśamātraṃ cetyanumeyam
GSP33brssbh2u:655: (chā. 6.4) tataḥ paraṃ brahmaikamevādvitīyaṃ, tatra sarvapramāṇānāṃ niṣṭhāmavocāma // 15
GSP33brssbh2u:656: FN: kāraṇasya bhāve sattve upalabdhau ca kāryasya
GSP33brssbh2u:661: 'sadeva somyedamagra āsīt' (chā. 6.2.1), 'ātmā vā idameka evāgra āsīt'
GSP33brssbh2u:664: yacca yadātmanā yatra na vartate na tattata utpadyate, yathā sikatābhyastailam /
GSP33brssbh2u:666: yathāca kāraṇaṃ brahma triṣu kāleṣu sattvaṃ na vyabhicaratyevaṃ kāryamapi jagattriṣu kāleṣu sattvaṃ na vyabhicarati /
GSP33brssbh2u:668: asadvyapadeśān neti cen na dharmāntareṇa vākyaśeṣāt |
GSP33brssbh2u:669: nanu kvacidasattvamapi prāgutpatteḥ kāryasya vyapadiśati śrutiḥ -
GSP33brssbh2u:675: tarhi vyākṛtanāmarūpatvāddharmādavyākṛtanāmarūpatvaṃ dharmāntaraṃ tena dharmāntareṇāyamasadvyapadeśaḥ prāgutpatteḥ sata eva kāryasya kāraṇarūpeṇānanyasya /
GSP33brssbh2u:679: iha ca tāvat 'asadevedamagra āsīt' ityasacchabdenopakrame nirdiṣṭaṃ yattadeva punastacchabdena parāmṛśya saditi viśinaṣṭi 'tatsadāsīt' iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:681: 'asadvā idamagra āsīt' ityatrāpi 'tadātmānaṃ svayamakuruta' iti vākyaśeṣe viśeṣaṇānnātyantāsattvam
GSP33brssbh2u:683: nāmarūpavyākṛtaṃ hi vastu sacchabdārhaṃ loke prasiddham /
GSP33brssbh2u:685: FN: agre śūnyamāsīcchūnyādeva jagatabhūditi pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:686: rāddhānte tu idaṃ jagadagre sṛṣṭeḥ prāgasadavyākṛtanāmarūpatvādasattulyamatisūkṣmaṃ brahmaivāsīt
GSP33brssbh2u:689: yukteśca prāgutpatteḥ kāryasya sattvamananyatvaṃ ca kāraṇādavagamyate,
GSP33brssbh2u:693: nahi dadhyarthibhirmṛttikopādīyate na ghaṭārthibhiḥ kṣīraṃ tadasatkāryavāde nopapadyeta /
GSP33brssbh2u:694: aviśiṣṭe hi prāgutpatteḥ sarvasya sarvatrāsatve kasmātkṣīrādeva dadhyutpadyate na mṛttikāyāḥ mṛttikāyā eva ca ghaṭa utpadyate na kṣīrāt /
GSP33brssbh2u:695: athāviśiṣṭe 'pi prāgasattve kṣīra eva dadhnaḥ kaścidatiśayo na mṛttikāyāṃ,
GSP33brssbh2u:696: mṛttikāyāmeva ca ghaṭasya kaścidatiśayo na kṣīra ityucyeta,
GSP33brssbh2u:698: śaktiśca kāraṇasya kāryaniyamārthā kalpamānā nānyāsatī vā kāryaṃ niyacchet /
GSP33brssbh2u:705: atha samavāyaḥ svayaṃ saṃbandharūpatvādanapekṣyaivāparaṃ saṃbandhaṃ saṃbadhyate, saṃyogo 'pi tarhi svayaṃ saṃbandharūpatvādanapekṣyaiva
GSP33brssbh2u:708: kathaṃ ca kāryamavayavidravyaṃ kāraṇeṣvavayavadravyeṣu vartamānaṃ vartate
GSP33brssbh2u:712: nahi bahutvaṃ samasteṣvāśrayeṣu vartamānaṃ vyastāśrayagrahaṇena gṛhyate /
GSP33brssbh2u:714: 'vayavāḥ kalpyeran yairārambhakeṣvavayaveṣvavayavaśo 'vayavī varteta kośāvayavavyatiriktairhyavayavairasiḥ kośaṃ vyāpnoti /
GSP33brssbh2u:717: atha pratyavayavaṃ varteta tadaikatra vyāpāre.'nyatrāvyāpāraḥ syāt /
GSP33brssbh2u:725: yadi gotvādivatpratyekaṃ parisamāpto 'vayavī syādyathā gotvaṃ prativyakti
GSP33brssbh2u:726: pratyakṣaṃ gṛhyata evamavayavyapi pratyavayavaṃ pratyakṣaṃ gṛhyeta /
GSP33brssbh2u:728: pratyekaparisamāptau cāvayavinaḥ kāryeṇādhikārāttasya caikatvācchṛṅgeṇāpi stanakāryaṃ kuryādurasā ca pṛṣṭhakāryam /
GSP33brssbh2u:730: prāgutpatteśca kāryasyāsattva utpattirakartṛkā nirātmikā ca syāt /
GSP33brssbh2u:731: utpacattiśca nāma kriyā, sā sakartṛkaiva bhavitumarhati gatyādivat /
GSP33brssbh2u:732: kriyā ca nāma syādakartṛkā ceti vipratiṣidhyeta /
GSP33brssbh2u:733: ghaṭasya cetpattirucyamānā na ghaṭakartṛkā kiṃ tarihyanyakartṛketi kalpyā syāt /
GSP33brssbh2u:735: tathāca sati ghaṭa utpadyata ityukte kulālādīnāmapyutpadyamānatā pratīyate
GSP33brssbh2u:739: satorhi dvayoḥ saṃbandhaḥ saṃbhavati na sadasatorasatorvā /
GSP33brssbh2u:741: satāṃ hi loke kṣetragṛhādīnāṃ maryādā dṛṣṭā nābhāvasya /
GSP33brssbh2u:743: maryādākāraṇena nirupākhyo vandhyāputro rājā babhūva prākpūrṇavarmaṇo
GSP33brssbh2u:744: 'bhiṣekādityevañjātīyakena maryādākaraṇena nirupākhyo vandhyaputro rājā babhūva bhavati bhaviṣyatīti vā viśeṣyate /
GSP33brssbh2u:745: yadi ca vandyāputro 'pi kārakavyāpārādūrdhvamabhaviṣyattata idamapyupātsyata kāryābhāvo 'pi kārakavyāpārādūrdhvaṃ bhaviṣyatīti /
GSP33brssbh2u:746: vayaṃ tu paśyāmo vandyāputrasya kāryābhāvasya cābhāvatvāviśeṣādyathā vandhyāputraḥ kārakavyāpārādūrdhvaṃ na bhaviṣyatyevaṃ kāryābhāvo 'pi
GSP33brssbh2u:750: evaṃ prāksiddhatvāttadananyatvācca kāryasya svarūpasiddhaye 'pi na kaścidvyāpriyeta /
GSP33brssbh2u:758: nahi devadattaḥ saṃkocitahastapādaḥ prasāritahastapādaśca viśeṣaṇa dṛśyamāno 'pi vastvanyatvaṃ gacchati, sa eveti pratyabhijñānāt /
GSP33brssbh2u:759: tathā pratidinamanekasaṃsthānānāmapi pitrādīnāṃ na vastvanyatvaṃ bhavati,
GSP33brssbh2u:760: mama pitā mama bhrātā mama putra iti pratyabhijñānāt /
GSP33brssbh2u:764: adṛśyamānānāmapi vaṭadhānādīnāṃ samānajātīyāvayavāntaropacitānāmaṅ kurādibhāvena darśanagocaratāpattau janmasaṃjñā /
GSP33brssbh2u:766: tatredṛgjanmocchedāntaritatvāccedasataḥ sattvapattistathā sati garbhavāsina uttānaśāyinaśca bhedaprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:770: yasyapunaḥ prāgutpatterasatkāryaṃ tasya nirviṣayaḥ kārakavyāpāraḥ syāt /
GSP33brssbh2u:778: tasmātkṣīrādīnyeva dravyāṇi dadhyādibhāvenāvatiṣṭhamānāni kāryākhyāṃ labhanta iti na kāraṇādanyatkāryaṃ varṣaśatenāpi śakyaṃ niścetum /
GSP33brssbh2u:779: tathā mūlakāraṇamevāntyātkāryāttena tena kāryākāreṇa naṭavatsarvavyavahārāspadatvaṃ pratipadyate
GSP33brssbh2u:780: evaṃ yukteḥ kāryasya prāgutpatteḥ sattvamananyatvaṃ ca kāraṇādavagamyate /
GSP33brssbh2u:782: pūrvasūtre 'sadvyapadeśinaḥ śabdasyodāhṛtatvāttato 'nyaḥ sadvyapadeśī śabdaḥ śabdāntaram- 'sadeva somyedamagra āsīdekamevādvitīyam' ityādi /
GSP33brssbh2u:786: tatredaṃśabdavācyasya kāryasya prāgutpatteḥ sacchabdavācyena kāraṇena sāmānādhikaraṇyasya śrūyamāṇatvātsattvānanyatve prasiddhyataḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:787: yadi tu prāgutpatterasatkāryaṃ syātpaścāccotpadyamānaṃ kāraṇe samaveyāttadānyakāraṇātsyāt
GSP33brssbh2u:788: tatra 'yenāśrutaṃ śrutaṃ bhavati' (chā. 6.1.3) itīyaṃ pratijñā pīḍyeta /
GSP33brssbh2u:796: yathā ca saṃveṣṭitaḥ paṭo na vyaktaṃ gṛhyate kimayaṃ paṭaḥ kiṃ vānyaddravyamiti /

GSP33brssbh2u:798: yathāca saṃveṣṭanasamaye paṭa iti gṛhyamāṇe 'pi na viśiṣṭāyāmavistāro gṛhyate sa eva prasāraṇasamaye viśiṣṭāyāmavistāro gṛhyate na saṃveṣṭitarūpādanyo 'yaṃ bhinnaḥ paṭa iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:799: evaṃ tantvādikāraṇāvasthaṃ paṭādikāryamaspaṣṭaṃ sat turīvemakuvindādikārakavyāpāradibhirvyaktaṃ spaṣṭaṃ gṛhyate /
GSP33brssbh2u:803: yathā ca loke prāṇāpānādiṣu prāṇabhedeṣu prāṇāyāmena niruddheṣu kāraṇamātreṇa rūpeṇa vartamāneṣu jīvanamātraṃ kāryaṃ nivartyate nākuñcanaprasāraṇādikaṃ kāryāntaram /

GSP33brssbh2u:816: itarasya śārīrasya brahmātmatvaṃ vyapadiśati śrutiḥ - 'sa ātmā tattvamasi śvetaketo' (chā. 6.8.7) iti prabodhanāt /

GSP33brssbh2u:830: sarvo hi lokaḥ spaṣṭaṃ kāryaṃ kṛtvā smarati mayedaṃ kṛtamiti /

GSP33brssbh2u:839: nahi tasya hitaṃ kiñcitkartavyamastyahitaṃ vā parihartavyaṃ,
GSP33brssbh2u:841: naca tasya jñānapratibandhaḥ śaktipratibandho vā kvacidapyasti,
GSP33brssbh2u:844: natu taṃ vayaṃ jagataḥ sraṣṭāraṃ brūmaḥ /

GSP33brssbh2u:854: apica yadā tattvamasītyevañjātīyakenābhedanirdeśenābhedaḥ pratibodhito bhavatyapagataṃ bhavati tadā jīvasya saṃsāritvaṃ brahmaṇaśca sraṣṭṛtvaṃ,
GSP33brssbh2u:856: tatra kuta eva sṛṣṭiḥ kuto vā hitākaraṇādayo doṣāḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:863: yathā ca loke pṛthivītvasāmānyānvitānāmapyaśmanāṃ kecinmahārhā maṇayo vajravaiḍūryādayo 'nye madhyamavīryāḥ sūryakāntādayo 'nye prahīṇāḥ śvavāyasaprakṣepaṇārhāḥ pāṣāṇā ityanekavidhaṃ vaicitryaṃ dṛśyate /
GSP33brssbh2u:864: yathā caikapṛthivīvyapāśrayāṇāmapi bījānāṃ bahuvidhaṃ patrapuṣpaphalagandharasādivaicitryaṃ candanakiṃpākādiṣūpalakṣyate /
GSP33brssbh2u:865: yathā caikasyāpyannarasasya lohitādīni keśalomādīni ca vicitrāṇi kāryāṇi bhavanti /
