GSP33brssbh2u:870: upasaṃhāradarśanān neti cen na kṣīravad dhi |
GSP33brssbh2u:871: cetanaṃ brahmaikamadvitīyaṃ jagataḥ kāraṇamiti yaduktaṃ tannopapadyate /
GSP33brssbh2u:874: iha hi loke kulālādayo ghaṭapaṭādīnāṃ kartāro mṛddaṇḍacakrasūtrādyanekakārakopasaṃhāreṇa saṃgṛhītasādhanāḥ santastattatkāryaṃ kurvāṇā dṛśyante /
GSP33brssbh2u:875: brahma cāsahāyaṃ tavābhipretaṃ tasya sādhanāntarānupasaṃgrahe sati kathaṃ sraṣṭṛtvamupapadyeta
GSP33brssbh2u:879: yathā hi loke kṣīraṃ jalaṃ vā svayameva dadhihimabhāvena pariṇamate
GSP33brssbh2u:881: nanu kṣīrādyapi dadhyādibhāvena pariṇāmamānapekṣata eva bāhyaṃ sādhanamauṣṇyādikaṃ kathamucyate kṣīravaddhīti /
GSP33brssbh2u:883: svayamapi hi kṣīraṃ yāṃ ca yāvatīṃ ca pariṇāmamātramanubhavati tāvatyeva tvāryate tvauṣṇyādinā dadhibhāvāya /
GSP33brssbh2u:884: yadi ca svayaṃ dadhibhāvaśīlatā na syānnaivauṣṇyādināpi balāddadhibhāvamāpadyeta /
GSP33brssbh2u:889: śrutiśca bhavati- 'na tasya kāryaṃ kāraṇaṃ ca vidyate na
GSP33brssbh2u:891: parāsya śaktirvividhaiva śrūyate svābhāvikī jñānabalakriyā ca //
GSP33brssbh2u:900: cetanāḥ punaḥ kulālādayaḥ sādhanasāmagrīmapekṣyaiva tasmai kāryāya pravartamānā dṛśyante /
GSP33brssbh2u:903: yathā loke devāḥ pitara ṛṣaya ityevamādayo mahāprabhāvāścetanā api santo
GSP33brssbh2u:904: 'napekṣyaiva kiñcidbāhyaṃ sādhanamaiśvaryaviśeṣayogādabhidhyānamātreṇa svata eva bahūni nānāsaṃsthāni śarīrīṇi prāsādādīni ca rathādīni ca
GSP33brssbh2u:909: evaṃ cetanamapi brahmānapekṣya bāhyaṃ sādhanaṃ svata eva jagatsrakṣyati /
GSP33brssbh2u:910: sa yadi brūyādya ete devādayo brahmaṇo dṛṣṭāntā upāttāste dārṣṭrāntikena brahmaṇā na samānā bhavanti /
GSP33brssbh2u:911: śarīrameva hyacetanaṃ devādīnāṃ śarīrāntarādivibhūtyutpādana upādānaṃ natu cetana ātmā /
GSP33brssbh2u:914: padminī ca cetanaprayuktā satyacetanevaiva śarīreṇa sarontaropasarpaṇe vyāpriyate /
GSP33brssbh2u:918: yathā hi kulālādīnāṃ devādīnāṃ ca samāne cetanatve kulālādayaḥ kāryārambhe bāhyaṃ sādhanamapekṣante na devādayaḥ, tathā brahma cetanamapi na bāhyaṃ sādhanamapekṣiṣyata ityetadvākyaṃ devādyudāharaṇena vivakṣyāmaḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:919: tasmādyathaikasya sāmarthyaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ tathā sarveṣāmeva bhavitumarhatīti nāstyekānta ityabhiprāyaḥ FN: lokyate jñāyater'thoneneti loko mantrārthavādādiśāstraṃ vṛddhavyavahāraśca /
GSP33brssbh2u:921: yathā bhārate śrīkṛṣṇasya saṃkalpamātreṇa draupadyāḥ paṭaparamparotpattiḥ tathā asahāyasyāpi brahmaṇaḥ kāraṇatvam /
GSP33brssbh2u:925: cetanamekamadvitīyaṃ brahma kṣīrādivaddevādivaccānapekṣya bāhyasādhanaṃ svayaṃ pariṇamamānaṃ jagataḥ kāraṇamiti sthitam /
GSP33brssbh2u:927: kṛtsnaprasaktiḥ kṛtsnasya brahmaṇaḥ kāryarūpeṇa pariṇāmaḥ prāpnoti,
GSP33brssbh2u:931: niravayavaṃ tu brahma śrutibhyo 'vagamyate- 'niṣkalaṃ niṣkriyaṃ śāntaṃ niravadyaṃ nirañjanam' (śve. 6.19), 'divyo hyamūrtaḥ puruṣaḥ sabāhyābhyantarohyajaḥ' (mu. 2.1.2), 'idaṃ mahadbhūtamanantamapāraṃ vijñānaghana eva' (bṛ. 2.4.12), 'sa eṣa neti netyātmā' (bṛ. 3.9.26),
GSP33brssbh2u:936: athaitaddoṣaparijihīrṣayā sāvayavameva brahmābhyupagamyeta tathāpi ye niravayavatvasya pratipādakāḥ śabdā udāhṛtāste prakuṣyeyuḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:938: sarvathāyaṃ pakṣo na ghaṭayituṃ śakyata ityākṣipati // 26 //
GSP33brssbh2u:947: yathaiva hi brahmaṇo jagadutpattiḥ śrūyata evaṃ vikāravyatirekeṇāpi brahmaṇo 'vastānaṃ śrūyate, prakṛtivikārayorbhedena vyapadeśāt 'seyaṃ
GSP33brssbh2u:948: devataikṣata hantāhamimāstisro devatā anena jīvenātmanānupraviśya nāmarūpe
GSP33brssbh2u:949: vyākaravāṇi' (chā. 6.3.2) iti, 'tāvānasya mahimā tato jyāyāṃśca puruṣaḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:950: pādo 'sya sarvā bhūtāni tripādasyāmṛtaṃ divi' (chā. 3.12.6) iti caivañjātīyakāt /
GSP33brssbh2u:952: yadi ca kṛtsnaṃ brahma kāryābhāvenopayuktaṃ syāt 'satā somya tadā saṃpanno
GSP33brssbh2u:958: śabdamūlaṃ ca brahma śabdapramāṇakaṃ nendriyādipramāṇakaṃ tadyathāśabdamabhyupagantavyam /
GSP33brssbh2u:961: tā api tāvannopadeśamantareṇa kevalena tarkeṇāvagantuṃ śakyante 'sya
GSP33brssbh2u:962: vastuna etāvatya etatsahāya etadviṣayā etatprayojanāśca śaktaya iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:963: kimutācintyasvabhāvasya brahmaṇo rūpaṃ vinā śabdena na nirūpyeta /
GSP33brssbh2u:964: tathācāhuḥ paurāṇikāḥ - 'acintyāḥ khalu ye bhāvā na tāṃstarkeṇa yojayet /
GSP33brssbh2u:967: nanu śabdenāpi na śakyate viruddhor'thaḥ pratyāyayituṃ niravayavaṃ ca
GSP33brssbh2u:971: atha kenacidrūpeṇa pariṇameta kenaciccāvatiṣṭheteti rūpabhedakalpanātsāvayavameva prasajyeta
GSP33brssbh2u:972: kriyāviṣaye hi 'atirātre ṣoḍaśinaṃ gṛhṇāti' 'nātirātre ṣoḍaśinaṃ gṛhṇāti'
GSP33brssbh2u:973: ityevañjātīyakāyāṃ virodhapratītāvapi vikalpāśrayaṇaṃ virodhaparihārakāraṇaṃ bhavati puruṣatantratvāccānuṣṭhānasya
GSP33brssbh2u:974: iha tu vikalpāśrayaṇenāpi na virodhaparihāraḥ saṃbhavatyapuruṣatantratvādvastunaḥ tasmāddurghaṭametaditi
GSP33brssbh2u:978: nahi timiropahatanayanenāneka iva candramā dṛśyamāno 'neka eva bhavati /
GSP33brssbh2u:979: avidyākalpitena ca nāmarūpalakṣaṇena rūpabhedena vyākṛtāvyākṛtātmakena tattvānyatvābhyāmanirvacanīyena brahma pariṇāmādisarvavyavahārāspadatvaṃ pratipadyate /
GSP33brssbh2u:981: vācārambhaṇamātratvāccāvidyākalpitasya nāmarūpabhedasyeti na niravayavatvaṃ brahmaṇaḥ kupyati
GSP33brssbh2u:985: 'sa eṣa neti netyātmā' ityupakramyāha- 'abhayaṃ vai janaka prāpto 'si'
GSP33brssbh2u:989: apica naivātra vivaditavyaṃ kathamekasminbrahmaṇi svarūpānupamardenaivānekākārā sṛṣṭiḥ syāditi
GSP33brssbh2u:991: paṭhyate- 'na tatra rathā na rathayogo na panthāno bhavantyatha rathārathayogānpathaḥ sṛjate' ( bṛ. 4.3.10) ityādinā /
GSP33brssbh2u:992: loke 'pi devādiṣu māyāvyādiṣu ca svapnarūpānupamardenaiva vicitrā hastyaśvādisṛṣṭayo dṛśyante
GSP33brssbh2u:996: pradhānavādino 'pi hi niravayavamaparicchinnaṃ śabdādihīnaṃ pradhānaṃ sāvavasya paricchinnasya śabdādimataḥ kāryasya kāraṇamiti svapakṣaḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:998: nanu naiva tairniravayavaṃ pradhānamabhyupagamyate, sattvarajastamāṃsi trayo guṇā nityāsteṣāṃ sāmyāvasthā pradhāne tairevāvayavaistatsāvayavamiti
GSP33brssbh2u:999: naivañjātīyakena sāvayavatvena prakṛto doṣaḥ parihartuṃ pāryate /
GSP33brssbh2u:1004: atha śaktaya eva kāryavaicitryasūcitā avayavā ityabhiprāyaḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:1008: athaikadeśena saṃyujyeta tathāpi niravayavatvābhyupagamakopa iti svapakṣe
GSP33brssbh2u:1017: ekasyāpi brahmaṇo vicitraśaktiyogādupapadyate vicitro vikāraprapañca ityuktam /
GSP33brssbh2u:1024: yathāhi darśayati śrutiḥ sarvaśaktiyogaṃ parasyā devatāyāḥ - 'sarvakarmā
GSP33brssbh2u:1033: syādetat vikaraṇāṃ parāṃ devatāṃ śāsti śāstram-
GSP33brssbh2u:1035: kathaṃ sā sarvaśaktiyuktāpi satī kāryāya prabhavet /
GSP33brssbh2u:1036: devādayo hi cetanāḥ sarvaśaktiyuktā api santa ādhyatmikakāryakaraṇasaṃpannā eva tasmaitasmai kāryāya prabhavanto vijñāyante /
GSP33brssbh2u:1041: naca yathaikasya sāmarthyaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ tathānyasyāpi sāmarthyena bhavitavyamiti niyamo 'stīti
GSP33brssbh2u:1043: tathāca śāstram- 'apāṇipādo javano grahītā paśyatyacakṣuḥ sa
GSP33brssbh2u:1049: na khalu cetanaḥ paramātmedaṃ jagadbimbaṃ viracayitumarhati /
GSP33brssbh2u:1052: cetano hi loke buddhipūrvakārī puruṣaḥ pravartamāno na mandopakramāmapi tāvatpravṛttimātmaprayojanānupayogināmārabhamāṇo dṛṣṭaḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:1054: bhavati ca lokaprasiddhyanuvādinī śrutiḥ- 'na vā are sarvasya kāmāya sarvaṃ priyaṃ bhavatyātmanastu kāmāya sarvaṃ priyaṃ bhavati' (bṛ. 2.4.5)
GSP33brssbh2u:1055: iti gurutarasaṃrambhā ceyaṃ pravṛttiryaduccāvacaprapañcaṃ jagadbimbaṃ viracayitavyam /
GSP33brssbh2u:1056: yadīyamapi pravṛttiścetanasya paramātmana ātmaprayojanopayoginī parikalpyeta paritṛptitvaṃ paramātmanaḥ śrūyamāṇaṃ bādhyeta /
GSP33brssbh2u:1058: atha cetano 'pi sannunmatto buddhyaparādhādantareṇaivātmaprayojanaṃ pravartamāno dṛṣṭastathā paramātmāpi pravartiṣyata ityucyeta /
GSP33brssbh2u:1059: tathā sati sarvajñatvaṃ paramātmanaḥ śrūyamāṇaṃ bādhyeta /
GSP33brssbh2u:1064: yathā loke kasyacidāptaiṣaṇasya vā vyatiriktaṃ kiñcitprayojanamabhisaṃdhāya kevalaṃ līlārūpāḥ pravṛttayaḥ krīḍāvihāreṣu bhavanti, yathā cocchvāsapraśvāsādayo 'nabhisaṃdhāya bāhyaṃ kiñcitprayojanaṃ svabhāvādeva saṃbhavanti evamīśvarasyāpyanapekṣya kiñcitprayojanāntaraṃ svabhāvādeva kevalaṃ līlārūpā pravṛttirbhaviṣyati /
GSP33brssbh2u:1065: na hīśvarasya prayojanāntaraṃ nirūpyamāṇaṃ nyāyataḥ śrutito vā saṃbhavati /
GSP33brssbh2u:1067: yadyapyasmākamiyaṃ jagadbimbaviracanā gurutarasaṃrambhevābhāti tathāpi parameśvarasya līlaiva kevaleyaṃ, aparimitaśaktitvāt /
GSP33brssbh2u:1068: yadi nāma loke līlāsvapi kiñcitsūkṣmaṃ prayojanamutprekṣyeta tathāpi naivātra kiñcitprayojanamutprekṣituṃ śakyate, āptakāmaśruteḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:1077: vaiṣamyanairghṛṇye na sāpekṣatvāt tathā hi darśayati |
GSP33brssbh2u:1083: paśvādīn, kāṃścinmadhyamabhogabhājo manuṣyādīnītyevaṃ viṣamāṃ sṛṣṭiṃ nirmimāṇasyaiśvarasya pṛthagjanasyeva rāgadveṣopapatteḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:1085: tathā khalajanairapi jugupsitaṃ nirghṛṇatvamatikrūratvaṃ duḥkhayogavidhānātsarvaprajopasaṃhārācca prasajyeta /
GSP33brssbh2u:1090: yadi hi nirapekṣaḥ kevala īśvaro viṣamāṃ sṛṣṭiṃ nirmimīte syātāmetau doṣau vaiṣamyaṃ nairghṛṇyaṃ ca /
GSP33brssbh2u:1097: yathāhi parjanyo vrīhiyavādisṛṣṭau sādhāraṇaṃ kāraṇaṃ bhavati,
GSP33brssbh2u:1098: vrīhiyavādivaiṣamye tu tattadbījagatānyevāsādhāraṇāni sāmarthyāni kāraṇāni bhavanti, evamīśvaro devamanuṣyādisṛṣṭau sādhāraṇaṃ kāraṇaṃ kṣavati /
GSP33brssbh2u:1099: devamanuṣyādivaiṣamye tu tattajjīvagatānyevāsādhāraṇāni karmāṇi kāraṇāni bhavantyevamīśvaraḥ sāpekṣatvānna vaiṣamyanairghṛṇyābhyāṃ duṣyati /
GSP33brssbh2u:1100: kathaṃ punaravagamyate sāpekṣa īśvaro nīcamadhyamottamaṃ saṃsāraṃ nirmimīta iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:1101: tathāhi darśayati śrutiḥ - 'eṣa hyeva sādhu karma kārayati taṃ yamebhyo
GSP33brssbh2u:1102: lokebhya unninīṣata eṣa u evāsādhu karma kārayati taṃ yamadho ninīṣate'
GSP33brssbh2u:1104: 'puṇyo vai puṇyena karmaṇā bhavati pāpaḥ pāpena' (bṛ. 3.2.13) iti ca /
GSP33brssbh2u:1109: yaṃ janumunninīṣate ūrdhvaṃ netumicchati taṃ sādhu kārayatyeṣa īśvara ityanvayaḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:1111: 'sadeva somyedamagra āsīdekamevādvitīyam' (chā. 6.2.1) iti prāksṛṣṭeravibhāgāvadhāraṇānnāsti karma yadapekṣya viṣamā sṛṣṭiḥ syāt /
GSP33brssbh2u:1112: sṛṣṭyuttarakālaṃ hi śarīrādivibhāgāpekṣaṃ karma, karmāpekṣaśca śarīrādivibhāga itītaretarāśrayatvaṃ prasajyeta /
GSP33brssbh2u:1113: ato vibhāgādūrdhvaṃ karmāpekṣa īśvaraḥ pravartatāṃ nāma /
GSP33brssbh2u:1118: anādau tu saṃsāre bījāṅ kuravaddhetumadbhāvena karmaṇaḥ sargavaiṣamyasya ca pravṛttirna virudhyate kathaṃ punaravagamyate 'nādireṣa saṃsāra iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:1127: naca karmāntareṇa śarīraṃ saṃbhavati, naca śarīramantareṇa karma
GSP33brssbh2u:1129: anāditve tu bījāṅ kuranyāyenopapatterna kaściddoṣo bhavati /
GSP33brssbh2u:1131: śrutau tāvat 'anena jīvenātmanā' (chā. 6.3.2) iti sargapramukhe śārīramātmānaṃ jīvaśabdena prāṇadhāraṇanimittenābhilapannanādiḥ saṃsāra iti darśayati /
GSP33brssbh2u:1132: ādimattve tu prāganavadhāritaprāṇaḥ san kathaṃ prāṇādadhāraṇanimittena jīvaśabdena sargapramukhe 'bhilapyeta /
GSP33brssbh2u:1135: 'sūryācandramasau dhātā yathāpūrvamakalpayat' (ṛ.saṃ 10.190.3) iti ca mantravarṇaḥ pūrvakalpasadbhāvaṃ darśayati /
GSP33brssbh2u:1136: smṛtāvapyanāditvaṃ saṃsārasyopalabhyate- 'na rūpamasyeha tathopalabhyate nānto na cādirna ca saṃpratiṣṭhā' (gī. 15.3) iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:1137: purāṇe cātītānāgatānāṃ ca kalpanāṃ na parimāṇamastīti sthāpitam // 36 //
GSP33brssbh2u:1140: cetanaṃ brahma jagataḥ kāraṇaṃ prakṛtiścetyasminnavadhārite vedārthe parairupakṣiptānvilakṣaṇatvādīndoṣānparyahārṣīdācāryaḥ
GSP33brssbh2u:1141: idānīṃ parapakṣapratiṣedhapradhānaṃ prakaraṇaṃ prāripsamāṇaḥ svapakṣaparigrahapradhānaṃ prakaraṇamupasaṃharati
GSP33brssbh2u:1142: yasmādasminbrahmaṇi kāraṇe parigṛhyamāṇe pradarśitena prakāreṇa sarve kāraṇadharmā upapadyante 'sarvajñaṃ sarvaśakti mahāmāyaṃ ca brahma' iti,
GSP33brssbh2u:1144: iti śrīgovindabhagavatpūjyapādaśiṣyaśaṅkarabhagavatpūjyapādakṛtau śārīrakamīmāṃsābhāṣye dvitīyādhyāyasya prathamaḥ pādaḥ samāptaḥ // 1 //
GSP33brssbh2u:1146: yadyapīdaṃ vedāntavākyānāmaidaṃparyaṃ nirūpayituṃ śāstraṃ pravṛttaṃ na tarkśāstravat devalābhir yuktibhiḥ kaṃcit siddhāntaṃ sādhayituṃ dūṣayituṃ vā pravṛttam /
GSP33brssbh2u:1147: tathāpi vedāntavākyam api vyācakṣāṇaiḥ samyagdarśanapratipakṣabhūtāni sāṃkhyādidarśanāni nirākaraṇīyāṇīti tadarthaḥ paraḥ pādaḥ pravartate /
GSP33brssbh2u:1148: vedāntārthanirṇayasya ca samyagdarśanārthatvāt tannirṇayena svapakṣasthāpanaṃ prathamaṃ kṛtaṃ taddyabhyarhitaṃ parapakṣapratyākhyānād iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:1149: nanu mumukṣūṇāṃ mokṣasādhanatvena samyagdarśananirūpaṇāya svapakṣasthāpanam eva kevalaṃ kartuṃ yuktaṃ kiṃ parapakṣanirākaraṇena paradveṣakareṇa /
GSP33brssbh2u:1151: tathāpi mahājanaparigṛhītāni mahānti sāṃkhyāditantrāṇi samyagdarśanāpadeśena pravṛttānyupalabhya bhavet keṣāṃcin mandamatīnām etāny api samyagdarśanāyopadeyānītyapekṣā /
GSP33brssbh2u:1152: tathā yuktagāḍhatvasaṃbhavena sarvajñabhāṣitatvācca śraddhā ca teṣvityatastadasāratopapādanāya prayatyate /
GSP33brssbh2u:1154: 1.1.18) 'etena sarve vyākhyātā vyākhyātāḥ' (bra,sū. 1.4.28) iti ca pūrvatrāpi sāṃkhyādipakṣapratikṣepaḥ kṛtaḥ, kiṃ punaḥ kṛtakaraṇeneti /
GSP33brssbh2u:1156: svapakṣānuguṇenaiva yojayanto vyācakṣate, teṣāṃ yadvyākhyānaṃ tadvyākhyanābhāsaṃ na samyagvyakhyānamityetāvatpūrvaṃ kṛtam /
GSP33brssbh2u:1157: iha tu vākyanirapekṣaḥ svatantrastadyuktipratiṣedhaḥ kriyata ityeṣa viśeṣaḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:1158: tatra sāṃkhyā manyante- yathā ghaṭaśarāvādayo bhedā mṛdātmanānvīyamānā mṛdātmakasāmānyapūrvakā loke dṛṣṭāḥ, tathā sarva eva bāhyādhyātmikā bhedāḥ sukhaduḥkhamohātmatayānvīyamānāḥ sukhaduḥkhamohātmakasāmānyapūrvikā bhavitumarhanti /
GSP33brssbh2u:1159: yattatsukhaduḥkhamohātmakaṃ sāmānyaṃ tatttriguṇaṃ pradhānaṃ mṛdvadacetanaṃ cetanasya puruṣārthaṃ sādhayituṃ svabhāvenaiva vicitreṇa vikārātmanā vivartata iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:1161: tatra vadāmaḥ - yadi dṛṣṭāntabalenaivaitannirūpyeta, nācetanaṃ loke cetanānadhiṣṭhitaṃ svatantraṃ kiñcidviśiṣṭapuruṣārthanirvartanasamarthānvikārānviracayaddṛṣṭam /
GSP33brssbh2u:1162: gehaprāsādaśayanāsanavihārabhūmyādayo hi loke prajñāvadbhiḥ śilpibhiryathākālaṃ sukhaduḥkhaprāptiparihārayogyā racitā dṛśyante /
GSP33brssbh2u:1164: ādhyatmikaṃ ca śarīrādi nānājātyanvitaṃ pratiniyatāvayavavinyāsamanekakarmaphalānubhavādhiṣṭhānaṃ dṛśyamānaṃ prajñāvadbhiḥ saṃbhāvitatamaiḥ śilpibhirmanasāpyālocayitumaśakyaṃ sat kathamacetanaṃ pradhānaṃ racayet /
GSP33brssbh2u:1166: mṛdādiṣvapi kumabhakārādyadhiṣṭhiteṣu viśiṣṭākārā racanā dṛśyate tadvatpradhānasyāpi cetanāntarādiṣṭhitatvaprasaṅgaḥ
GSP33brssbh2u:1167: naca mṛdādyupādānasvarūpavyapāśrayeṇaiva dharmeṇa mūlakāraṇamavadhāraṇīyaṃ na bāhyakumbhakārādivyapāśrayeṇeti kiñcinniyāmakamasti /
GSP33brssbh2u:1168: nacaivaṃ sati kiñcidvirudhyate, pratyuta śrutiranugṛhyate cetanakāraṇasamarpaṇāt /
GSP33brssbh2u:1175: tathā parimitānāṃ bhedānāṃ mūlāṅ kurādīnāṃ saṃsargapūrvakatvaṃ dṛṣṭvā bāhyādhyātmikānāṃ bhedānāṃ parimitatvātsaṃsargapūrvakatvamanumimānasya sattvarajastamasāmapi saṃsargapīrvakatvaprasaṅgaḥ parimitatvaviśeṣāt /
GSP33brssbh2u:1176: kāryakāraṇabhāvastu prekṣāpūrvakanirmitānāṃ śayanāsanādīnāṃ dṛṣṭa iti na kāryakāraṇabhāvādbāhyādhyātmikānāṃ bhedānāmacetanapūrvakatvaṃ śakyaṃ kalpayitum // 1 //
GSP33brssbh2u:1180: tatsiddhyarthā yā pravṛttiḥ sāmyāvasthānātpracyutiḥ sattvarajastamasāmaṅgāṅgibhāvarūpāpattirviśiṣṭakāryābhimukhapravṛttitā sāpi nācetanasya pradhānasya svatantrasyopapadyate,
GSP33brssbh2u:1182: nahi mṛdādayo rathādayo vā svayamacetanāḥ santaścetanaiḥ kulālādibhiraśvādibhirvānadhiṣṭhitā viśiṣṭakāryābhimukhapravṛttayo dṛśyante dṛṣṭāccādṛṣṭisiddhiḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:1184: nanu cetanasyāpi pravṛttiḥ kevalasya na dṛṣṭā /
GSP33brssbh2u:1189: yasminpravṛttirdṛṣṭā tasya sota yatasaṃyuktasya dṛṣṭā tasya seti /
GSP33brssbh2u:1190: nanu yasmindṛśyate pravṛttistasyaiva seti yuktamubhayoḥ pratyakṣatvāt /
GSP33brssbh2u:1192: pravṛtyāśrayadehādisaṃyuktasyaiva tu cetanasya sadbhāvasiddhiḥ kevalācetanarathādivailakṣaṇyaṃ jīvadehasya dṛṣṭamiti /
GSP33brssbh2u:1193: ata eva ca pratyakṣe dehe sati darśanādasati cādarśanāddehasyaiva caitanyamapīti laukāyatikāḥ pratipannāḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:1195: tadabhidhīyate- na brūmo yasminnacetane pravṛttirdṛśyate na tasya seti /
GSP33brssbh2u:1199: yathā kāṣṭhādivyapāśrayāpi dāhaprakāśalakṣaṇā vikriyānupalabhyamānāpi ca kevale jvalane jvalanādeva bhavati, tatsaṃyoge darśanāttadviyoge cādarśanāttadvat /
GSP33brssbh2u:1200: laukāyatikānāmapi cetana eva deho 'cetanānāṃ rathādīnāṃ pravartako dṛṣṭa
GSP33brssbh2u:1202: nanu tava dehādisaṃyuktasyāpyātmano vijñānasvarūpamātravyatirekeṇa pravṛttyanupapatteranupapannaṃ pravartakatvamiti cet /
GSP33brssbh2u:1205: yathāyaskānto maṇiḥ svayaṃ pravṛttirahito 'pyayasaḥ pravartako bhavati /
GSP33brssbh2u:1206: yathā vā rūpādayo viṣayāḥ svayaṃ pravṛttirahitā api cakṣurādīnāṃ pravartakābhavanti /
GSP33brssbh2u:1207: evaṃ pravṛttirahito 'pīśvaraḥ sarvagataḥ sarvātmā sarvajñaḥ sarvaśaktiśca san sarvaṃ pravartayedityupapannam
GSP33brssbh2u:1215: yathā kṣīramacetanaṃ svabhāvenaiva vatsavivṛddhyarthaṃ pravartate, yathāca jalamacetanaṃ svabhāvenaiva lokopakārāya syandata evaṃ pradhānamacetanaṃ svabhāvenaiva puruṣārthasiddhaye pravartiṣyata iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:1220: vā akṣarasya praśāsane gārgi prācyonyā nadyaḥ syandante' (bṛ. 3.8.9)
GSP33brssbh2u:1227: 'upasaṃhāradarśanānneti cenna kṣīravaddhi' (bra.sū. 2.1.24) ityatra tu bāhyanimittanirapekṣamapi svāśrayaṃ kāryaṃ bhavatītyetallokadṛṣṭyā nidarśitam /
GSP33brssbh2u:1228: śāstradṛṣṭyā tu punaḥ sarvatraiveśvarāpekṣatvamāpadyamānaṃ na parāṇudyate
GSP33brssbh2u:1233: natu tadvyatirekeṇa pradhānasya pravartakaṃ nivartakaṃ vā kiñcidbāhyamapekṣyamavastitamasti
GSP33brssbh2u:1234: puruṣastūdāsīno na pravartako na nivartaka ityato 'napekṣaṃ pradhānaṃ,
GSP33brssbh2u:1235: anapekṣatvācca kadācitpradhānaṃ mahadādyākāreṇa pariṇamate kadācinna pariṇamata ityetadayuktam
GSP33brssbh2u:1236: īśvarasya tu sarvajñatvātsarvaśaktitvānmahāmāyatvācca pravṛttyapravṛttī na virudhyete // 4
GSP33brssbh2u:1239: yathā tṛṇapallavodādi nimittāntaranirapekṣaṃ svabhāvādeva kṣīrādyākāreṇa pariṇamata evaṃ pradhānamapi mahadādyākāreṇa pariṇaṃsyata iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:1242: yadi hi kiñcinnimittamupalabhemahi tato yathākāmaṃ tena tṛṇādyupādāya kṣīraṃ saṃpādayemahi, natu saṃpādayāmahe /
GSP33brssbh2u:1244: atrocyate- bhavettṛṇādivatsvābhāvikaḥ pradhānasyāpi paraṇāmo yadi tṛṇāderapi svābhāvikaḥ pariṇāmo 'bhyupagamyeta /
GSP33brssbh2u:1247: dhenvaiva hyupayuktaṃ tṛṇādi kṣīro bhavati na prahīṇamanaḍudādyupayuktaṃ vā /
GSP33brssbh2u:1249: naca yathākāmaṃ mānuṣairna śakyaṃ saṃpādayitumityetāvatā nirnimittaṃ bhavati /
GSP33brssbh2u:1251: manuṣyā api śaknuvatyevocitenopāyena tṛṇādyupādāya kṣīraṃ saṃpādayitum /
GSP33brssbh2u:1252: prabhūtaṃ hi kṣīraṃ kāmayamānāḥ prabhūtaṃ ghāsaṃ dhenuṃ cārayanti /
GSP33brssbh2u:1258: athāpi nāma bhavataḥ śraddhāmanurudhyamānāḥ svābhāvikīmeva pradhānasya pravṛttimabhyupagacchema tathāpi doṣo 'nuṣajyetaiva /
GSP33brssbh2u:1261: yadi tāvatsvābhāvikī pradhānasya pravṛttirna kiñcidanyadihāpekṣata ityucyeta tato yathaiva sahakāri kiñcinnāpekṣata evaṃ prayojanamapi kiñcinnāpekṣiṣyate ityataḥ pradhānaṃ puruṣasyārthaṃ sādhayituṃ pravartata itīyaṃ pratijñā hīyeta /
GSP33brssbh2u:1262: sa yadi brūyātsahakāryeva kevalaṃ nāpekṣate na prayojanamapīti /
GSP33brssbh2u:1263: tathāpi pradhānapravṛtteḥ prayojanaṃ vivektavyaṃ bhogo vā syādapavargo vobhayaṃ veti /
GSP33brssbh2u:1278: yathā kaścitpuruṣo dṛkśaktisaṃpannaḥ pravṛttiśaktihīnaḥ paṅguraparaṃ puruṣaṃ pravṛttiśaktisaṃpannaṃ dṛkśaktihīnamandhamadhiṣṭhāya pravartayati
GSP33brssbh2u:1280: evaṃ puruṣaḥ pradhānaṃ pravartayiṣyatīti dṛṣṭāntapratyayena punaḥ pratyavasthānam /
GSP33brssbh2u:1283: pradhānasya svatantrasya pravṛttyabhyupagamāt, puruṣasya na pravartakatvānabhyupagamāt
GSP33brssbh2u:1291: tathā pradhānasyācaitanyātpuruṣasya caudāsīnyāttṛtīyasya ca tayoḥ saṃbandhayiturabhāvātsaṃbandhānupapattiḥ
GSP33brssbh2u:1294: paramātmanastu svarūpavyapāśrayamaudāsīnyaṃ māyāvyapāśrayaṃ ca pravartakatvamityastyatiśayaḥ aṅgitvānupapatteś ca |
GSP33brssbh2u:1300: athāpi syādanyathā vayamanumimīmahe yathā nāyamanantaro doṣaḥ prasajyeta /
GSP33brssbh2u:1303: yathā yathā kāryotpāda upapadyate tathā tathaiṣāṃ svabhāvo 'bhyupagamyate
GSP33brssbh2u:1305: tasmātsāmyāvasthāyāmapi vaiṣamyopagamayogyā eva guṇā avatiṣṭhanta iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:1306: evamapi pradhānasya jñaśaktiviyogādracanānupapattyādayaḥ pūrvoktā doṣāstadavasthā eva /
GSP33brssbh2u:1309: vaiṣamyopagamayogyā api guṇāḥ sāmyāvasthāyāṃ nimittābhāvānnaiva vaiṣamyaṃ bhajeran /
GSP33brssbh2u:1310: bhajamānā vā nimittābhāvāviśeṣātsarvadaiva vaiṣamyaṃ bhajeranniti prasajyata evāyamanantaro 'pi doṣaḥ // 9 //
GSP33brssbh2u:1316: prasiddha eva tu śrutyeśvarakāraṇavādinyā virodhastadanuvartinyā ca smṛtyā
GSP33brssbh2u:1319: ekaṃ hi brahma sarvātmakaṃ sarvasya prapañcasya kāraṇamabhyupagacchatāmekasyaivātmano viśeṣau tapyatāpakau na jātyantarabhūtāvityabhyupagantavyaṃ syāt /
GSP33brssbh2u:1320: yadi cetau tapyatāpakāvekasyātmano viśeṣau syātāṃ sa tābhyāṃ tapyatāpakābhyāṃ na nirmucyata iti tāpopaśāntaye samyagdarśanamupadiśacchāstramanarthakaṃ syāt /
GSP33brssbh2u:1321: nahyauṣṇyaprakāśadharmakasya pradīpasya tadavasthasyaiva tābhyāṃ nirmokṣa upapadyate /
GSP33brssbh2u:1322: yo 'pijalataraṅgavīcīphenādyupanyāsaḥ, tatrāpi jalātmana ekasya vīcyādanyo viśeṣā āvirbhāvatirobhāvarūpeṇa nityā eveti samāno jalātmano vīcyādibhiranirmokṣaḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:1325: yadyarthinaḥ svato 'nyor'tho na syāt, yasyārthino yadviṣayamarthitvaṃ sa
GSP33brssbh2u:1326: tasyārtho nityasiddha eveti na tasya tadviṣayamarthitvaṃ syāt, yathā prakāśātmanaḥ pradīpasya prakāśākhyortho nityasiddha eveti na tasya tadviṣayamarthitvaṃ bhavati /
GSP33brssbh2u:1338: tapyastu puruṣo ya ekaḥ paryāyeṇobhābhyāṃ saṃbadhyata iti tayostapyatāpakayorekātmatāyāṃ mokṣānupapattiḥ
GSP33brssbh2u:1342: bhavedeṣa doṣo yadyekātmatāyāṃ tapyatāpakāvānyonyasya viṣayaviṣayibhāvaṃ pratipadyeyātām /
GSP33brssbh2u:1344: nahyagnirekaḥ sansvamātmānaṃ dahati prakāśayati vā satyapyauṣṇyaprakāśādidharmabhede pariṇāmitve ca /
GSP33brssbh2u:1347: ucyate- kiṃ na paśyasi karmabhūto jīvaddehastapyastāpakaḥ saviteti /
GSP33brssbh2u:1348: nanu taptirnāma duḥkhaṃ sā cetayiturnācetanasya dehasya /
GSP33brssbh2u:1349: yadi hi dehasyaiva taptiḥ syātsā dehanāśe svayameva naśyatīti tannāśāya sādhanaṃ naiṣitavyaṃ syāditi /
GSP33brssbh2u:1350: ucyate- dehābhāve 'pi kevalasya cetanasya taptirna dṛṣṭā /
GSP33brssbh2u:1351: naca tvayāpi taptirnāma vikriyā cetayituḥ kevalasyeṣyate /
GSP33brssbh2u:1354: kathaṃ tavāpi tapyatāpakabhāvaḥ sattvaṃ tapyaṃ tāpakaṃ raja iti cet /
GSP33brssbh2u:1357: sattvānurodhitvāccetano 'pi tapyata iveti cet, paramārthatastarhi naiva tapyata ityāpatatīvaśabdaprayogāt
GSP33brssbh2u:1359: nahi ḍuṇḍubhaḥ sarpaṃ ivetyetāvatā saviṣo bhavati /
GSP33brssbh2u:1360: sarpo vā ḍuṇḍubha ivetyetāvatā nirviṣo bhavati /
GSP33brssbh2u:1364: atha pāramārthikameva cetanasya tapyatvamabhyupagacchasi tavaiva sutarāmanirmokṣaḥ prasajyeta , nityatvābhyupagamācca tāpakasya /
GSP33brssbh2u:1365: tapyatāpakaśaktyornityatve 'pi sanimittasaṃyogāpekṣatvāpatteḥ saṃyoganimittādarśananivṛttāvātyantikaḥ saṃyogoparamaḥ, tataścātyantiko mokṣa upapanna iti cet /
GSP33brssbh2u:1369: aupaniṣadasya tvātmaikatvābhyupagamādekasya ca viṣayaviṣayibhāvānupapattervikārabhedasya ca vācārambhaṇamātratvaśravaṇādanirmokṣaśaṅkā svapne 'pi nopajāyate /
GSP33brssbh2u:1370: vyavahāre tu yatra yathā dṛṣṭastapyatāpakabhāvastatra tathaiva sa iti na codayitavyaḥ parihartavyo vā bhavati // 10 //
GSP33brssbh2u:1372: sarmendriyāṇi pañca, saptamaṃ ca mana iti saptendriyāṇi /
GSP33brssbh2u:1380: tatrādau tāvadyo 'ṇuvādinā brahmavādini doṣa utprekṣyate sa pratisamādhīyate /
GSP33brssbh2u:1381: tatrāyaṃ vaiśeṣikāṇāmabhyupagamaḥ - kāraṇadravyasamavāyino guṇāḥ kāryadravye samānajātīyaṃ guṇāntaramārabhante, śuklebhyastantubhyaḥ śuklasya paṭasya prasavadarśanāttadviparyayādarśanācca tasmāccetanasya brahmaṇo jagatkāraṇatve 'bhyupagamyamāne kārye 'pi jagati cetanyaṃ samaveyāt
GSP33brssbh2u:1382: tadadarśanāttu na cetanaṃ brahma jagatkāraṇaṃ bhavitumarhatīti /
GSP33brssbh2u:1385: eṣā teṣāṃ prakriyā- paramāṇavaḥ kila kañcitkālamanārabdhakāryā yathāyogaṃ rūpādimantaḥ pārimaṇḍalyaparimāṇaśca tiṣṭhanti /
GSP33brssbh2u:1386: te ca paścādadṛṣṭādipuraḥsarāḥ saṃyogasacivāśca santo dvyaṇukādikrameṇa kṛtsnaṃ kāryajātamārabhante
GSP33brssbh2u:1388: yadā dvau paramāṇū dvyaṇukamārabhete tadā paramāṇugatā rūpādiguṇaviśeṣāḥ śuklādayo dvyaṇuke śaklādīnaparānārabhante /
GSP33brssbh2u:1392: yadāpi dve dvyaṇuke caturaṇukamārabhete tadāpi samānaṃ dvyaṇukasamavāyināṃ śuklādīnāmārambhakatvam
GSP33brssbh2u:1393: aṇutvahrasvatve tu dvyaṇukasamavāyinī api naivārabhete, caturaṇukasya mahattvādīrghatvaparimāṇayogābhyupagamāt
GSP33brssbh2u:1394: yadāpi bahavaḥ paramāṇavo bahūni vā dvyaṇukāni dvyaṇukasahito vā paramāṇuḥ kāryamārabhate tadāpi samānaiṣā yojanā /
GSP33brssbh2u:1395: tadevaṃ yathā paramāṇoḥ parimaṇḍalātsato 'ṇu hrasvaṃ ca dvyaṇukaṃ jāyate mahaddīrghaṃ ca tryaṇukādi na parimaṇḍalam, yathā vā dvyaṇukādaṇorhrasvācca sato mahaddīrghaṃ ca tryaṇukaṃ jāyate nāṇu no hrasvam, evaṃ cetanādbrahmaṇo 'cetanaṃ jagajjaniṣyata ityabyupagame kiṃ
GSP33brssbh2u:1397: atha manyase virodhinā parimāṇāntareṇākrāntaṃ kāryadravyaṃ dvyaṇukādītyato nārambhakāṇi kāraṇagatāni pārimaṇḍalyādīnītyabhyupagacchāmi, natu cetanāvirodhinā guṇāntareṇa jagata ākrāntatvamasti, yena kāraṇagatā cetanā
GSP33brssbh2u:1402: yathā kāraṇe vidyamānānāmapi pārimāṇḍalyādināmanārambhakatvamevaṃ caitanyasyāpītyasyāṃśasya samānatvāt /
GSP33brssbh2u:1405: naca parimāṇāntarārambhe vyagrāṇi pārimāṇḍalyādīnītyataḥ svasamānajātīyaṃ parimāṇāntaraṃ nārabhante parimāṇāntarasyānyahetutvābhyupagamāt /
GSP33brssbh2u:1410: pārimāṇḍalyādīnītyucyeta, dravyāntare guṇāntare vārabhyamāṇe sarveṣāmeva kāraṇaguṇānāṃ svāśrayasamavāyaviśeṣāt
GSP33brssbh2u:1417: naca dravyasya dravyamevodāhartavyaṃ guṇasya vā guṇa eveti kaścinniyame heturasti /
GSP33brssbh2u:1421: yathā pratyakṣāpratyakṣayorbhūmyākāśayoḥ samavayansaṃyogo 'pratyakṣa evaṃ pratyakṣāpratyakṣeṣu pañcasu bhūteṣu samavayaccharīramapratyakṣaṃ syāt /
GSP33brssbh2u:1424: etaduktaṃ bhavati- guṇaśca saṃyogo dravyaṃ śarīram /
GSP33brssbh2u:1425: 'dṛśyate tu' (bra. sū. 2.1.6) iti cātrāpi vilakṣaṇotpattiḥ prapañcitā /
GSP33brssbh2u:1429: nanvatideśo 'pi samānanyāyatayā kṛtaḥ 'etena śiṣṭāparigrahā api vyākhyātāḥ' (bra.sū. 2.1.12) iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:1431: tasyaiva tvayaṃ vaiśeṣikaprakriyārambhe tatprakriyānugatena nidarśanena prapañcaḥ kṛtaḥ // FN: paramāṇuḥ parimaṇḍalaḥ tadgataṃ parimāṇaṃ pārimāṇḍalyam /
GSP33brssbh2u:1437: sa ca vāda itthaṃ samuttiṣṭhata- paṭādīni hi loke sāvayavāni dravyāṇi svānugateraiva saṃyogasacivaistantvādibhirdravyairārabhyamāṇāni dṛṣṭāni /
GSP33brssbh2u:1438: tatsāmānyena yāvatkiñcitsāvayavaṃ tatsarvaṃ svānugateraiva saṃyogasacivaistairdravyairārabdhamiti gamyate /
GSP33brssbh2u:1442: nacākāraṇena kāryeṇa bhavitavyamityataḥ paramāṇavo jagataḥ kāraṇamiti kaṇabhugabhiprāyaḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:1443: tānīmāni catvāri bhūtāni bhūmyudakatejaḥpavanākhyāni sāvayavānyupalabhya caturvidhāḥ paramāṇavaḥ parikalpyante teṣāṃ cāpakarṣaparyantagatatvena parato vibhāgāsaṃbhavādvanaśyatāṃ pṛthivyādīnāṃ paramāṇuparyanto vibhāgo bhavati sa pralayakālaḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:1444: tataḥ sargakāle ca vāyavīyeṣvaṇuṣvadṛṣṭāpekṣaṃ karmotpadyate tatkarma svāśrayamaṇumaṇvantareṇa saṃniyukti tato dvyaṇukādikrameṇa vāyurutpadyate /
GSP33brssbh2u:1448: aṇugatebhyaśca rūpādibhyo dvyaṇukādigatāni rūpādīni saṃbhavanti tantupaṭanyāyeneti kāṇādā manyante /
GSP33brssbh2u:1453: abhyupagame 'pi yadi prayatno 'bhighātādirvā (athā)yathādṛṣṭaṃ kimapi karmaṇo nimittamabhyupagamyeta tasyāsaṃbhavānnaivāṇuṣvādyaṃ karma syāt /
GSP33brssbh2u:1455: śarīrapratiṣṭhe hi manasyātmanaḥ saṃyoge satyātmaguṇaḥ prayatno jāyate /
GSP33brssbh2u:1457: sargottarakālaṃ hi tatsarvaṃ nādyasya karmaṇo nimittaṃ saṃbhavati /
GSP33brssbh2u:1458: athādṛṣṭamādyasya karmaṇo nimittamityucyeta tatpunarātmasamavāyi vā syādaṇusamavāyi vā /
GSP33brssbh2u:1460: nahyacetanaṃ cetanenānadhiṣṭhitaṃ svatantraṃ pravartate pravartayati veti sāṃkhyaprakriyāyāmabhihitam
GSP33brssbh2u:1467: saṃyogābhāvācca tannibandhanaṃ dvyaṇukādi kāryajātaṃ na syāt /
GSP33brssbh2u:1470: pradeśavato dravyasya pradeśavatā dravyāntareṇa saṃyogasya dṛṣṭatvāt /
GSP33brssbh2u:1473: kalpitānāmavastutvādavastveva saṃyoga iti vastunaḥ kāryasyāsamavāyikāraṇaṃ na syāt /
GSP33brssbh2u:1475: yathācādisarge nimittābhāvātsaṃyogotpattyarthaṃ karma nāṇūnāṃ saṃbhavatyevaṃ mahāpralaye 'pi vibhāgotpattyarthaṃ karma naivāṇūnāṃ
GSP33brssbh2u:1478: adṛṣṭamapi bhogaprasiddhyarthaṃ na pralayaprasiddhyarthamityato nimittābhāvānna syādaṇūnāṃ saṃyogotpattyarthaṃ vibhāgotpattyarthaṃ vā karma /
GSP33brssbh2u:1489: yathaiva hyaṇubhyāmatyantabhinnaṃ sadvyaṇukaṃ samavāyalakṣaṇena saṃbandhena tābhyāṃ saṃbadhyata evaṃ samavāyo 'pi samavāyibhyo
GSP33brssbh2u:1492: tataśca tasya tasyānyonyaḥ saṃbandhaḥ kalpayitavya ityanavasthaiva prasajyeta /
GSP33brssbh2u:1493: nanviha pratyayagrāhyaḥ samavāyo nityasaṃbaddha eva samavāyibhirgṛhyate nāsaṃbaddhaḥ saṃbandhāntarāpekṣo vā /
GSP33brssbh2u:1494: tataśca na tasyānyaḥ saṃbandhaḥ kalpayitavyo yenānavasthā prasajyeteti /
GSP33brssbh2u:1496: saṃyogo 'pyevaṃ sati saṃyogibhirnityasaṃbaddha eveti samavāyavannānyaṃ saṃbandhamapekṣeta
GSP33brssbh2u:1507: apicāṇavaḥ pravṛttisvabhāvā vā nivṛttisvabhāvā vobhayasvabhāvā vānubhayasvabhāvā vābhyupagamyante gatyantarābhāvāt /
GSP33brssbh2u:1516: sāvayavānāṃ dravyāṇāmavayavavaśo vibhajyamānānāṃ yataḥ paro vibhāgo na saṃbhavati te caturvidhā rūpādimantaḥ paramāṇavaścaturvidhasya rūpādimato bhūtabhautikasyārambhakā nityāśceti yadvaiśeṣikā abhyupagacchanti sa teṣāmabhyupagamo nirālambana eva /
GSP33brssbh2u:1521: yadi loke rūpādimadvastu tatsvakāraṇāpekṣayā sthūlamanityaṃ ca dṛṣṭam /
GSP33brssbh2u:1522: tadyathā paṭastantūnapekṣya sthūle 'nityaśca bhavati tantavaścaṃśūnapekṣya sthūlā anityāśca bhavanti, tathācāmī paramāṇavo rūpādimantastairabhyupagamyante, tasmātte 'pi kāraṇavantastadapekṣayā sthūlā anityāśca prāpnuvanti /
GSP33brssbh2u:1523: yacca nityatve kāraṇaṃ tairuktam- 'sadakāraṇavannityam' (vai. sū. 4.1.1) iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:1527: yadapi nityatve dvitīyaṃ kāraṇamuktam- 'anityamiti ca viśeṣataḥ pratiṣedhābhāvaḥ' (vai. sū. 4.1.4) iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:1529: asati hi yasminkasmiṃścinnitye vastuni nityaśabdena nañaḥ samāso nopapadyate /
GSP33brssbh2u:1534: yadapi nityatve tṛtīyaṃ kāraṇamuktam- 'avidyā ca' (vai. sū. 4.1.5) iti,
GSP33brssbh2u:1535: tadyadyevaṃ vivrīyate satāṃ paridṛśyamānakāryāṇāṃ kāraṇānāṃ pratyakṣeṇāgrahaṇamavidyeti, tato dvyaṇukanityatāpyāpadyeta /
GSP33brssbh2u:1537: tasya ca prāgevoktatvāt 'avidyā ca' iti punaruktaṃ syāt /
GSP33brssbh2u:1540: nāvaśyaṃ vinaśyadvastu dvābhyāmeva hetubhyāṃ vinaṣṭumarhatiti niyamo 'sti
GSP33brssbh2u:1543: yadā tvapāstaviśeṣaṃ sāmānyātmakaṃ kāraṇaṃ viśeṣavadavasthāntaramāpadyamānamārambhakamabhyupagamyate tadā ghṛtakāṭhinyavilayanavanmūrtyavasthāvilayanenāpi vināśa upapadyate /
GSP33brssbh2u:1547: gandharasarūpasparśaguṇā sthūlā pṛthivī, rūparasasparśaguṇāḥ sūkṣmā āpaḥ,
GSP33brssbh2u:1548: rūpasparśaguṇaṃ sūkṣmataraṃ tejaḥ, sparśaguṇaḥ sūkṣmatamo vāyurityevametāni catvāri bhūtānyupacitāpacitaguṇāni
GSP33brssbh2u:1553: nacāntareṇāpi mūrtyupacayaṃ guṇopacayo bhavatītyucyate, kāryeṣu bhūteṣu guṇopacaye mūrtyupacayadarśanāt
GSP33brssbh2u:1554: akalpyamāne tūpacitāpacitaguṇatve paramāṇutvasāmyaprasiddhaye yadi tāvatsarvaṃ ekaikaguṇā eva kalpyeraṃstatastejasi sparśasyopalabdhirna
GSP33brssbh2u:1555: syāt, apsu rūpasparśayoḥ, pṛthivyāṃ ca rasarūpasparśānāṃ,
GSP33brssbh2u:1557: atha sarve caturguṇā eva kalpyetan, tato 'psvapi gandhasyopalabdhiḥ syāt,
GSP33brssbh2u:1564: ayaṃ tu paramāṇukāraṇavādo na kaiścidapi śiṣṭaiḥ kenacidapyaṃśena parigṛhīta ityatyantamevānādaraṇīyo vedavādibhiḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:1569: yathā hi loke śaśakuśapalāśaprabhṛtīnāmatyantabhinnānāṃ satāṃ netaretarādhīnatvaṃ bhavati, evaṃ dravyādīnāmatyantabhinnatvānnaiva dravyādhīnatvaṃ guṇādīnāṃ bhavitumarhati /
GSP33brssbh2u:1570: atha bhavati dravyādhīnatvaṃ guṇādīnāṃ tato dravyabhāve bhāvāddravyābhāve
GSP33brssbh2u:1577: iha tu śuklaḥ kambalo rohiṇī dhenurnīlamutpalamiti dravyasyaiva tasya tasya tena tena viśeṣeṇa pratīyamānatvānnaiva dravyaguṇayoragnidhūmayoriva bhedapratītirasti /
GSP33brssbh2u:1586: paṭasya tu guṇāḥ śuklatvādayaḥ paṭadeśā abhyupagamyante na tantudeśāḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:1590: tantugatāśca guṇāḥ śuklādayaḥ kāryadravye paṭe śuklādiguṇāntaramārabhanta iti hi te 'bhyupagacchanti
GSP33brssbh2u:1595: yutasiddhayoḥ saṃbandhaḥ saṃyogo 'pyutasiddhayostu samavāya ityayamabhyupagamo mṛṣaiva teṣāṃ, prāksiddhasya kāryātkāraṇasyāyutasiddhatvānupapatteḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:1596: athānyatarāpekṣa evāyamabhyupagamaḥ syādayutasiddhasya kāryasya kāraṇena saṃbandhaḥ samavāya iti, evamapi prāgsiddhasyālabdhātmakasya kāryasya
GSP33brssbh2u:1598: siddhaṃ bhūtvā saṃbadhyata iti cet, prākkāraṇasaṃbandhātkāryasya siddhāvabhyupagamyamānāyāmayutasiddhyabhāvātkāryakāraṇayoḥ
GSP33brssbh2u:1600: yathā cetpannamātrasyākriyasya kāryadravyasya vibhubhirākāśādibhirdravyāntaraiḥ saṃbandhaḥ saṃyoga evābhyupagamyate na samavāya evaṃ kāraṇadravyeṇāpi saṃbandhaḥ saṃyoga eva syānna samavāyaḥ nāpi saṃyogasya samavāyasya vā saṃbandhavyatirekeṇāstitve kiñcitpramāṇamasti /
GSP33brssbh2u:1604: yathaiko 'pi san devadatto loke svarūpaṃ saṃbandhirūpaṃ cāpekṣyānekaśabdapratyayabhāgbhavati, manuṣyo brāhmaṇaḥ śrotriyo vadānyo bālo yuvā sthaviraḥ pitā putraḥ pautro bhrātā jāmāteti, yathā caikāpi satī
GSP33brssbh2u:1610: tathāṇvātmamanasāmapradeśatvānna saṃyogaḥ saṃbhavati, pradeśavato dravyasya pradeśavatā dravyāntareṇa saṃyogadarśanāt /
GSP33brssbh2u:1614: iyānevāvidyamāno viruddho 'viruddho vārthaḥ kalpanīyo nāto 'dhika iti niyamahetvabhāvāt /
GSP33brssbh2u:1616: naca vaiśeṣikaiḥ kalpitebhyaḥ ṣaḍbhyaḥ padārthebhyo 'nye 'dhikāḥ śataṃ sahasraṃ vārthā na kalpayitavyā iti nivārako heturasti /
GSP33brssbh2u:1618: kaścitkṛpāluḥ prāṇināṃ duḥkhabahulaṃ saṃsāra eva mābhūditi kalpayet /
GSP33brssbh2u:1619: anyo vā vyasanī muktānāmapi punarutpattiṃ kalpayet /
GSP33brssbh2u:1622: dvābhyāṃ paramāṇubhyāṃ niravayavābhyāṃ sāvayavasya dvyaṇukasyākāśeneva saṃśleṣānupapattiḥ
GSP33brssbh2u:1624: kāryakāraṇadravyayorāśritāśrayabhāvo 'nyathā nopapadyata ityavaśyaṃ kalpyaḥ samavāya iti cet /
GSP33brssbh2u:1631: paramāṇūnāṃ paricchinnatvādyāvatyo diśaḥ ṣaḍaṣṭau daśa vā tāvadbhiravayavaiḥ sāvayavāste syuḥ sāvayavatvādanityāśceti nityatvaniravayavatvābhyupagamo bādhyeta /
GSP33brssbh2u:1632: yāṃstvaṃ digbhedabhedino 'vayavānkalpayasi ta eva paramāṇava iti cet /
GSP33brssbh2u:1635: yathā pṛthivī dvyaṇukādyapekṣayā sthūlatamā vastubhūtāpi vinaśyati, tataḥ sūkṣmaṃ sūkṣmataraṃ ca pṛthivyekajātīyakaṃ vinaśyati, tato dvyaṇukaṃ,
GSP33brssbh2u:1640: yathā hi ghṛtasuvarṇādīnāmavibhajyamānāvayavānāmapyagnisaṃyogāddravabhāvāpattyā kāṭhanyavināśo bhavati, evaṃ paramāṇūnāmapi paramakāraṇabhāvāpattyā
GSP33brssbh2u:1657: tatra te sarvāstitvavādino bāhyamāntaraṃ ca vastvabhyupagacchanti bhūtaṃ bhautikaṃ ca cittaṃ caittaṃ ca, tāṃstāvatpratibrūmaḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:1660: catuṣṭaye ca pṛthivyādiparamāṇavaḥ svarasnehoṣṇasvabhāvāste pṛthivyādibhāvena saṃhanyanta iti manyante /
GSP33brssbh2u:1663: tatredamabhidhīyate- yo 'yamubhayahetuka ubhayaprakāraḥ samudāyaḥ pareṣāmabhipreto 'ṇuhetukaśca bhūtabhautikasaṃhatirūpaḥ skandhahetukaśca pañcaskandhīrūpaḥ tasminnubhayahetuke 'pi samudāye 'bhipreyamāṇe
GSP33brssbh2u:1669: anyasya ca kasyaciccetanasya bhoktuḥ praśāsiturvā sthirasya saṃhanturanabhyupagamāt nirapekṣapravṛttyabhyupagame ca pravṛttyanuparamaprasaṅgāt /
GSP33brssbh2u:1674: FN: bhūte bhautikaṃ bāhyam, cittaṃ caittaṃ ca kāmādyantaramiti vibhāgaḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:1676: svarāḥ kaṭhināḥ pārthivāḥ paramāṇavaḥ, snigdhā āpyāḥ, uṣṇastaijasāḥ,
GSP33brssbh2u:1679: vijñānaskandhaḥ, sukhādyanubhavo vedāntaskandhaḥ, gauraśva ityevaṃnāmaviśiṣṭasavikalpapratyayaḥ saṃjñāskandhaḥ, rāgadveṣamohadharmāḥ saṃskāraskandhaḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:1682: yadyapi bhoktā praśāsitā vā kaściccetanaḥ saṃhantā sthiro nābhyupagamyate tathāpyavidyādīnāmitaretarakāraṇatvādupapadyate lokayātrā /
GSP33brssbh2u:1684: te cāvidyādayo 'vidyā saṃskāro vijñānaṃ nāma rūpaṃ ṣaḍāyatanaṃ sparśā
GSP33brssbh2u:1685: vedanā tṛṣṇā upādānaṃ bhavo jātirjarā maraṇaṃ śokaḥ paridevanā duḥkhaṃ durmanastetyevañjātīyakā itaretarahetukāḥ saugate samaye kvacitsaṃkṣiptā nirdiṣṭāḥ kvacitprapañcitāḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:1687: tadevamavidyādikalāpe parasparanimittanaimittikabhāvena ghaṭīyantravadaniśamāvartamāner'thākṣipta upapannaḥ saṃghāta iti cet /
GSP33brssbh2u:1697: saṃghātamantareṇātmānamalabhamānā apekṣante saṃghātamiti, tatastasya saṃghātasya nimittaṃ vaktavyam /
GSP33brssbh2u:1698: tacca nityeṣvapyaṇuṣvabhyupagamyamāneṣvāśrayāśrayibhūteṣu ca bhokteṣu satsu na saṃbhavatītyuktaṃ vaiśeṣikaparīkṣāyām /
GSP33brssbh2u:1699: kimaṅga punaḥ kṣaṇikeṣvapyaṇuṣu bhoktṛrahiteṣvāśrayiśūnyeṣu vābhyupagamyamāneṣu saṃbhavet
GSP33brssbh2u:1700: athāyamabhiprāyo 'vidyādaya eva saṃghātasya nimittamiti, kathaṃ tamevāśrityātmānaṃ labhamānāstasyaiva nimittaṃ syuḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:1701: atha manyase saṃghātā evānādau saṃsāre saṃtatyānuvartante tadāśrayāścāvidyādaya iti, tadapi
GSP33brssbh2u:1702: niyamena vā sadṛśamevotpadyeta, aniyamena vā sadṛśaṃ visadṛśaṃ votpadyeta /
GSP33brssbh2u:1704: aniyamābhyupagame 'pi manuṣyapudgalaḥ kadācitkṣaṇena hastī bhūtvā devo vā
GSP33brssbh2u:1707: apica yadbhogārthaḥ saṃghātaḥ syātsa nāsti sthiro bhokteti tavābhyupagamaḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:1708: tataśca bhogo bhogārtha eva sa nānyena prārthanīyaḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:1709: tathā mokṣo mokṣārthaṃ eveti mumukṣuṇā nānyena bhavitavyam /
GSP33brssbh2u:1712: tasmāditaretarotpattimātranimittatvamavidyādīnāṃ yadi bhavedbhavatu nāma natu saṃghātaḥ siddhyet
GSP33brssbh2u:1714: FN: kāryaṃ prati ayate gacchatīti pratyayaḥ kāraṇam /
GSP33brssbh2u:1715: vijñānaṃ pṛthivyādicatuṣṭayaṃ rūpaṃ ceti ṣaḍāyatanāni yasyendriyajātasya tatṣaḍāyatanam /
GSP33brssbh2u:1722: kṣaṇabhaṅgavādino 'yamabhyupagama uttarasminkṣaṇa utpadyamāne pūrvaḥ kṣaṇo nirudhyata iti
GSP33brssbh2u:1725: atha bhāvabhūtaḥ pariniṣpannāvasthaḥ pūrvakṣaṇa uttarakṣaṇasya heturityabhiprāyastathāpi nopapadyate
GSP33brssbh2u:1727: atha bhāva evāsya vyāpāra ityabhiprāyastathāpi naivopapadyate /
GSP33brssbh2u:1729: svabhāvoparāgābhyupagame ca hetusvabhāvasya phalakālāvasthāyitve sati kṣaṇabhaṅgābhyupagamatyāgaprasaṅgaḥ
GSP33brssbh2u:1730: vinaiva vā svabhāvoparāgeṇa hetu phalabhāvamabhyupagacchataḥ sarvatra tatprāpteratiprasaṅgaḥ
GSP33brssbh2u:1731: apicotpādanirodhau nāma vastunaḥ svarūpameva vā syātāmavasthāntaraṃ vā vastvantarameva vā
GSP33brssbh2u:1733: yadi tāvadvastunaḥ svarūpamevotpādanirodhau syātāṃ tato vastuśabda utpādanirodhaśabdau ca paryāyāḥ prāpnuyuḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:1734: asthāsti kaścidviśeṣa iti manyetotpādanirodhaśabdābhyāṃ madhyavartino vastuna ādyantākhye avasthe abhilapyete iti,
GSP33brssbh2u:1736: athātyantavyatiriktāvevotpādanirodhau vastunaḥ syātāmaśvamahiṣavat, tato vastu utpādanirodhābhyāmasaṃsṛṣṭamiti vastunaḥ śāśvatatvaprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:1737: yadi ca darśanādarśane vastuna utpādanirodhau syātām, evamapi draṣṭṛdharmau tau na vastudharmāviti vastunaḥ śāśvatatvaprasaṅga eva /
GSP33brssbh2u:1743: athāsatyeva hetau phalotpattiṃ brūyāt, tataḥ pratijñoparodhaḥ syāt /
GSP33brssbh2u:1744: caturvidhānhetūnpratītya cittacaittā utpadyanta itīyaṃ pratijñā hīyeta /
GSP33brssbh2u:1746: athottarakṣaṇotpattiryāvattāvadavatiṣṭhate pūrvakṣaṇa iti brūyāttato yaugapadyaṃ hetuphalayoḥ syāt /
GSP33brssbh2u:1750: apica vaināśikāḥ kalpayanti buddhibodhyaṃ trayādanyatsaṃskṛtaṃ kṣaṇikaṃ ceti /
GSP33brssbh2u:1752: trayamapi caitadavastvabhāvamātraṃ nirupākhyamiti manyante, buddhipūrvakaḥ kila vināśo bhāvānāṃ pratisaṃkhyānirodho nāma bhāṣyate, tadviparīto
GSP33brssbh2u:1760: etau hi pratisaṃkhyāpratisaṃkhyānirodhau saṃtānagocarau vā syātāṃ bhāvagocarau vā /
GSP33brssbh2u:1764: nahi bhāvānāṃ niranvayo nirupākhyo vināśaḥ saṃbhavati, sarvāsvapyavasthāsu pratyabhijñānabalenānvayyavicchedadarśanāt
GSP33brssbh2u:1768: pratīpā pratukūlaḥ saṃkhyā santaṃ bhāvamasantaṃ karomītyevaṃrūpā buddhiḥ pratisaṃkhyā tayā nirodhaḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:1770: yo 'yamavidyādinirodhaḥ pratisaṃkhyānirodhāntaḥpātī paraparikalpitaḥ, sa samyagjñānādvā saparikarātsyātsvayameva vā /
GSP33brssbh2u:1777: yacca teṣāmevābhipretaṃ nirodhadvayamākāśaṃ ca nirupākhyamiti, tatra nirodhadvayasya nirupākhyatvaṃ purastānnirākṛtam /
GSP33brssbh2u:1781: āgamaprāmāṇyāttāvat 'ātmana ākāśaḥ saṃbhūtaḥ' (tai. 2.1) ityādiśrutibhya ākāśasya ca vastutvaprāptiḥ
GSP33brssbh2u:1782: vipratipannānprati tu śabdaguṇānumeyatvaṃ vaktavyaṃ, gandhādīnāṃ guṇānāṃ pṛthivyādivastvāśrayatvadarśanāt
GSP33brssbh2u:1785: yenāvaraṇabhāvo viśeṣyate tattarhi vastubhūtamevākāśaṃ manyamānasya saugatasya svābhyupagamavirodhaḥ prasajyeta /
GSP33brssbh2u:1791: apica nirodhadvayamākāśaṃ ca trayamapyetannirūpākhyamavastu nityaṃ ceti vipratiṣiddham /
GSP33brssbh2u:1796: kiṃ samyak niścaya āśrayo 'syā iti kiṃ saṃniścayā /
GSP33brssbh2u:1798: apica vaināśikaḥ sarvasya vastunaḥ kṣaṇikatāmabhyupayannupalabdhurapi kṣaṇikatāmabhyupeyāt
GSP33brssbh2u:1805: apica darśanasmaraṇayoḥ kartaryekasminpratyakṣaḥ pratyabhijñāpratyayaḥ sarvasya lokasya prasiddho 'hamado 'drākṣamidaṃ paśyāmīti /
GSP33brssbh2u:1806: yadi hi tayorbhinnaḥ kartā syāttato 'haṃ smārāmyadrākṣīdanya iti pratīyāt
GSP33brssbh2u:1808: yatraivaṃ pratyayastatra darśanasmaraṇayorbhinnameva kartāraṃ sarvaloko 'vagacchati, smarāmyahamasāvado 'drākṣīditi /
GSP33brssbh2u:1811: na nāhamityātmano darśanaṃ nirvṛttaṃ nihnute yathāgniranuṣṇo 'prakāśa iti vā /
GSP33brssbh2u:1812: tatraivaṃ satyekasya darśanasmaraṇalakṣaṇadvayasaṃbandhe kṣaṇikatvābhyupagamahāniraparihāryā vaināśikasya syāt /
GSP33brssbh2u:1813: tathānantaramanantarāmātmana eva pratipattiṃ pratyabhijānannekakartṛkāmottamāducchvāsādatītāśca pratipattīrā janmana ātmaikakartṛkāḥ pratisaṃdadhānaḥ kathaṃ kṣaṇabhaṅgavādī vaināśiko nāpapeta sa yadi brūyātsādṛśyādetatsamapatsyata iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:1823: pratyayāntarameva cetsādṛśyaviṣayaṃ syāttenedaṃ sadṛśamiti vākyaprayogo 'narthakaḥ syāt
GSP33brssbh2u:1825: yadā hi lokaprasiddhaḥ padārthaḥ parīkṣakairna parigṛhyate tadā svapakṣasiddhiḥ parapakṣadoṣo vobhayamapyucyamānaṃ parīkṣakāṇāmātmanaśca yathārthatvena na buddhisaṃtānamārohati /
GSP33brssbh2u:1830: bhavedapi kadācidbāhyavastuni vipralambhasaṃbhavāttadevedaṃ syāttatsadṛśaṃ veti saṃdehaḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:1831: upalabdhari tu saṃdeho 'pi na kadācidbhavati sa evāhaṃ syāṃ tatsadṛśo veti
GSP33brssbh2u:1832: ya evāhaṃpūrvedyuradrākṣaṃ sa evāhamadya smarāmīti niścitatadbhāvopalambhāt /
GSP33brssbh2u:1835: itaścānupapanno vaināśikasamayaḥ, yataḥ sthiramanuyāyikāraṇamanabhyupagacchatāmabhāvādbhāvotpattirityetadāpadyate darśayanti cābhāvādbhāvotpattim- 'nānupamṛdya prādurbhāvāt' iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:1836: vinaṣṭāddhi kila bījādaṅ kura utpadyate, tathā vinaṣṭātkṣīrāddadhi,
GSP33brssbh2u:1845: nahi bījādīnāmupamṛditānāṃ yo 'bhāvastasyābhāvasya śaśaviṣāṇādīnāṃ ca niḥsvabhāvatvāviśeṣādabhāvatve kaścidviśeṣo 'sti, yena bījādevāṅ kuro
GSP33brssbh2u:1850: yadi punarabhāvasyāpi viśeṣo 'bhyupagamyetotpalādīnāmiva nīlatvādistato viśeṣavattvādevābhāvasya bhāvatvamutpalādivatprasajyeta /
GSP33brssbh2u:1854: sarvasya ca vastunaḥ svena svena rūpeṇa bhāvātmanaivopalabhyamānatvāt /
GSP33brssbh2u:1860: yeṣvapi bījādiṣu svarūpopamarde lakṣyate teṣvarapi nāsāvupamṛdyamānā pūrvāvasthottarāvasthāyāḥ
GSP33brssbh2u:1863: apica caturbhiścittacaittā utpadyante, paramāṇubhyaśca bhūtabhautikalakṣaṇaḥ samudāya utpadyata ityabhyupagamya punarabhāvādbhāvotpattiṃ kalpayadbhirabhyupagatamapahnuvānairvaināśikaiḥ sarvo loka ākulīkriyate // 26 //
GSP33brssbh2u:1878: evaṃ bāhyārtavādamāśritya samudāyāprāptyādiṣu dūṣaṇeṣūdbhāviteṣu vijñānavādī bauddha idānīṃ pratyavatiṣṭhite /
GSP33brssbh2u:1879: keṣāñcitkila bāhye vastunyabhiniveśamālakṣya tadanurodhena bāhyārthavādaprakriyeyaṃ virocitā
GSP33brssbh2u:1882: tasmiṃśca vijñānavāde buddhyārūḍhena rūpeṇāntastha eva pramāṇaprameyavyavahāraḥ sarva upapadyate
GSP33brssbh2u:1884: kathaṃ punaravagamyate 'ntastha evāyaṃ sarvavyavahāro na vijñānavyatirikto
GSP33brssbh2u:1887: sa hi bāhyortho 'bhyupagamyamānaḥ paramāṇavo vā syustatsamūhā vā stambhādayaḥ syuḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:1893: prativiṣayaṃ pakṣapātaḥ stambhajñānaṃ kuḍyajñānaṃ ghaṭajñānaṃ paṭajñānamiti, nāsau jñānagataviśeṣamantareṇopapadyata
GSP33brssbh2u:1901: yathāhi svapnamāyāmarīcyudakagandharvanagarādipratyayā vinaiva bāhyenārthena grāhyagrāhakākārā bhavanti, evaṃ jāgaritagocarā api
GSP33brssbh2u:1906: anādau hi saṃsāre bījāṅ kuravadvijñānānāṃ vāsanānāṃ cānyonyanimittanaimittikabhāvena vaicitryaṃ na vipratiṣidhyate /
GSP33brssbh2u:1915: upalabhyate hi pratipratyayaṃ bāhyor'thaḥ stambhaḥ kuḍyaṃ ghaṭaḥ paṭa iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:1917: yathā hi kaścidbhuñjāno bhujitasādhyāyāṃ tṛptau svayamanubhūyamānāyāmevaṃ brūyānnāhaṃ bhuñje na vā tṛpyāmīti, tadvadindriyasaṃnikarṣeṇa svayamupalabhamāna eva bāhyamarthaṃ nāhamupalabhe naca so 'stīti
GSP33brssbh2u:1919: nanu nāhamahaṃ bravīmi na kañcidarthamupalabha iti kiṃ tūpalabdhivyatiriktaṃ nopalabha iti bravīmi /
GSP33brssbh2u:1924: upalabdhiviṣayatvenaiva tu stambhakuḍyādīnsarve laukikā upalabhante yatpratyācakṣāṇā api bāhyārthameva vyācakṣate yadantarjñeyarūpaṃ tadbahirvadavabhāsata iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:1925: te 'pi sarvalokaprasiddhāṃ bahiravabhāsamānāṃ saṃvidaṃ pratilabhamānāḥ pratyākhyātukāmāśca bāhyamarthaṃ bahirvadati vatkāraṃ kurvanti /
GSP33brssbh2u:1928: tasmādyathānubhavaṃ tattvamabhyupagacchadbhirbahirevāvabhāsata iti yuktamabhyupagantuṃ natu bahirvadavabhāsata iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:1930: nāyaṃ sādhuradhyavasāyo yataḥ pramāṇapravṛttyapravṛttipūrvakau saṃbavāsaṃbhavāvavadhāryete na punaḥ saṃbhavāsaṃbhavapūrvike pramāṇapravṛttyapravṛttī /
GSP33brssbh2u:1932: yattu na kenacidapi pramāṇenopalabhyate tanna saṃbhavati /
GSP33brssbh2u:1933: iha tu yathāsvaṃ sarvaireva pramāṇairbāhyor'tha upalabhyamānaḥ kathaṃ vyatirekāvyatirekādivikalpairna saṃbhavatītyucyetopalabdhereva /
GSP33brssbh2u:1934: naca jñānasya viṣayasārūpyādviṣayanāśo bhavati, asati viṣaye viṣayasārūpyānupapatteḥ, bahirupalabdheśca viṣayasya /
GSP33brssbh2u:1935: ata eva sahopalambhaniyamo 'pi pratyayaviṣayayorupāyopeyabhāvahetuko nābhedahetuka ityabyupagantavyam
GSP33brssbh2u:1936: apica ghaṭajñānaṃ paṭajñānamiti viśeṣaṇayoreva ghaṭapaṭayorbhedo na viśeṣyasya jñānasya /
GSP33brssbh2u:1937: dvābhyāṃ ca bheda etasya siddho bhavatyekasmācca dvayoḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:1940: atrāpi hi viśeṣyayoreva darśanasmaraṇayorbhedo na viśeṣaṇas ghaṭasya /
GSP33brssbh2u:1941: yathā kṣīragandhaḥ kṣīrarasa iti viśeṣyayoreva gandharasayorbhedo na viśeṣaṇasya kṣīrasya tadvat /
GSP33brssbh2u:1945: vijñānaṃ vijñānamityabhyupagacchatā bāhyorthaḥ stambhaḥ kuḍyamityevañjātīyakaḥ tasmānnābhyupagamyata eveti yuktamabhyupagantum /
GSP33brssbh2u:1949: aviruddhaṃ tu lokaprasiddhaṃ svātmavyatiriktena vijñānena bāhyor'thonubhūyata iti necchāsyaho pāṇḍityaṃ mahaddarśitam /
GSP33brssbh2u:1951: nanu vijñānasya svarūpavyatiriktagrāhyatve tadapyanena grāhyaṃ tadapyanyenetyanavasthā prāpnoti
GSP33brssbh2u:1952: apica pradīpavadavabhāsātmakatvājjñānasya jñānāntaraṃ kalpayataḥ samatvādavabhāsyāvabhāsakabhāvānupapatteḥ kalpanānarthakyamiti /
GSP33brssbh2u:1958: pradīpavadvijñānamavabhāsakāntaranirapekṣaṃ svayameva prathata iti bruvatāpramāṇagamyaṃ vijñānamanavagantṛkamityuktaṃ syāt /
GSP33brssbh2u:1960: bāḍhamevam, anubhavarūpatvāttu vijñānasyeṣṭo naḥ pakṣastvayānujñāyata iti cet /
GSP33brssbh2u:1964: sākṣiṇo 'vagantuḥ svayaṃsiddhatāmupakṣipatā svayaṃ prathate vijñānamityeṣa eva mama pakṣastvayā vācoyuktyantareṇāśrita iti cet /
GSP33brssbh2u:1971: yaduktaṃ bāhyārthapalāyinā svapnādipratyayavajijāgaritagocarā api stambhādipratyayā vinaiva bāhyenārthena bhaveyuḥ pratyayatvāviśeṣāditi /
GSP33brssbh2u:1979: bādhyate hi svapnopalabdhaṃ vastu pratibuddhasya mithyā mayopalabdho mahājanasamāgama iti, nahyasti mama mahājanasamāgamo nidrālagnaṃ tu me
GSP33brssbh2u:1982: naivaṃ jāgaritopalabdhaṃ vastu stambhādikaṃ kasyāñcidapyavasthāyāṃ bādhyate /
GSP33brssbh2u:1987: tatraivaṃsati na śakyate vaktuṃ mithyā jāgaritopalabdhirūpalabdhitvātsvapnopalabdhivadityubhayorantaraṃ svayamanubhavatā /
GSP33brssbh2u:1990: naca yo yasya svato dharmo na saṃbhavati so 'nyasya sādharmyāttasya saṃbhaviṣyati /
GSP33brssbh2u:2001: arthopalabdhinimittā hi pratyarthaṃ nānārūpā vāsanā bhavanti /
GSP33brssbh2u:2002: anupalabhyamāneṣu tvartheṣu kiṃnimittā vicitrā vāsanā bhaveyuḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:2014: yadapyālayavijñānaṃ nāma vāsanāśrayatvena parikalpitaṃ tadapi kṣaṇikatvābhyupagamādanavasthitasvarūpaṃ satpravṛttivijñānavanna vāsanānāmadhikaraṇaṃ bhavitumarhati /
GSP33brssbh2u:2021: evametau dvāvapi vaināśikapakṣau nirākṛtau bāhyārthavādipakṣo vijñānavādipakṣaśca /
GSP33brssbh2u:2022: śūnyavādipakṣastu sarvapramāṇavipratiṣiddha iti tannirākaraṇāya nādaraḥ kriyate /
GSP33brssbh2u:2025: FN: nādaraḥ kriyate sūtrāntarāṇi na racyanta etānyevāvṛttyā yojayante /
GSP33brssbh2u:2028: sarvaprakāreṇa yathāyathāyaṃ vaināśikasamaya upapattimattvāya parīkṣyate tathātathā sikatākūpavadvidīryata eva /
GSP33brssbh2u:2031: apica bāhyārthavijñānaśūnyavādatrayamitaretaraviruddhamupadiśatā sugatena spaṣṭīkṛtamātmano 'saṃbaddhapralāpitvaṃ, pradveṣo vā prajāsu
GSP33brssbh2u:2040: sapta caiṣāṃ padārthāḥ saṃmatā jīvājīvāsravasaṃvaranirjarabandhamokṣā nāma
GSP33brssbh2u:2043: tayorimamaparaṃ prapañcamācakṣate pañcāstikāyā nāma- jīvāstikāyaḥ pudgalāstikāyo dharmāstikāyo 'dharmāstikāya ākāśāstikāyaśceti /
GSP33brssbh2u:2046: syādasti, syānnāsti, syādasti ca nāsti ca, syādavaktavyaḥ, syādasti
GSP33brssbh2u:2047: cāvaktavyaśca, syānnāsti cāvaktavyaśca, syādasti ca nāsti cāvaktavyaśceti
GSP33brssbh2u:2052: ya ete saptapadārthā nirdhāritā etāvanta evaṃrūpāśceti te tathaiva vā syurnaiva vā tathā syuḥ
GSP33brssbh2u:2053: itarathā hi tathā vā syuratathā vetyanirdhāritarūpaṃ jñānaṃ saṃśayajñānavadapramāṇameva syāt
GSP33brssbh2u:2054: nanvanekātmakaṃ vastviti nirdhāritarūpameva jñānamutpadyamānaṃ saṃśayajñānavannāpramāṇaṃ bhavitumarhati
GSP33brssbh2u:2056: niraṅ kuśaṃ hyanekāntatvaṃ sarvavastuṣu pratijānānasya nirdhāraṇasyāpi vastutvaviśeṣātsyāditi syānavnāstītyādivikalpopanipātādinirdhāraṇātmakataiva syāt /
GSP33brssbh2u:2057: evaṃ nirdhārayiturnirdhāraṇaphalasya ca syātpakṣe 'stitā syācca pakṣe nāstīti /
GSP33brssbh2u:2061: aikāntikaphalatvanirdhāraṇe hi sati tatsādhanānuṣṭhānāya sarvo loko
GSP33brssbh2u:2064: tathā pañcānāmastikāyānāṃ pañcatvasaṃkhyāsti vā nāsti veti vikalpyamānā
GSP33brssbh2u:2065: syāttāvadekasminpakṣe, pakṣāntare tu na syādityato nyūnasaṃkhyātvamadhikasaṃkhyātvaṃ vā prāpnuyāt
GSP33brssbh2u:2070: tathā tadavadhāraṇaphalaṃ samyagdarśanamasti vā nāsti vā, evaṃ tadviparītamasamyagdarśanamapyasti vā nāsti veti pralapanmattonmattapakṣasyaiva syānna pratyāyitavyapakṣasya /
GSP33brssbh2u:2071: svargāpavargayośca pakṣe bhāvaḥ pakṣe cābhāvastathā pakṣe nityatā pakṣe cānityatetyanavadhāraṇāyāṃ pravṛttyanupapattiḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:2073: evaṃ jīvādiṣu padārtheṣvekasmindharmiṇi sattvāsattvayorviruddhayordharmayorasaṃbhavātsattve caikasmindharme 'sattvasya dharmāntarasyāsaṃbhavādasattve caivaṃ sattvasyāsaṃbhavādasaṃgatamidamārhataṃ matam /
GSP33brssbh2u:2076: tatpūrveṇaivāṇuvādanirākaraṇena nirākṛtaṃ bhavatītyato na pṛthaktannirākaraṇāya prayatyate FN: jīvājīvau bhoktṛbhogyau, viṣayābhimukhyenenidriyāṇāṃ pravṛttirāsravaḥ,
GSP33brssbh2u:2077: tāṃ saṃvṛṇotīti saṃvaro yamaniyamādiḥ, nirjarayati nāśayati kalmaṣamiti
GSP33brssbh2u:2078: nirjarastaptaśilārohaṇādiḥ, bandhaḥ karma, mokṣaḥ karmapāśanāśe satyalokākāśapraviṣṭasya satatordhvagamanam /
GSP33brssbh2u:2082: saptānāṃstitvādīnāṃ bhaṅgānāṃ samāhāraḥ saptabhaṅgī tasyā nayo nyāyaḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:2084: yathaikasmindharmiṇi viruddhadharmāsaṃbhavo doṣaḥ syādvāde prasakta evamātmano 'pi jīvasyākārtsnyamaparo doṣaḥ prasajyeta /
GSP33brssbh2u:2087: śarīraparimāṇatāyāṃ ca satyāmakṛtsno 'sarvagataḥ paricchinna ātmetyato ghaṭādivadanityatvamātmanaḥ prasajyeta /
GSP33brssbh2u:2088: śarīrīṇāṃ cānavasthitaparimāṇatvānmanuṣyajīvo manuṣyaśarīraparimāṇo bhūtvā punaḥ kenacitkarmavipākena hastijanma prāpnuvanna kṛtsnaṃ hastiśarīraṃ vyāpnuyāt /
GSP33brssbh2u:2089: puttikājanma ca prāpmuvanna kṛtsnaḥ puttikāśarīre saṃmīyeta /
GSP33brssbh2u:2090: samāna eṣa ekasminnapi janmani kaumārayauvanasthavireṣu doṣaḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:2092: antāvayavo jīvastasya ta evāvayavā alpe śarīre saṃkuceyurmahati ca vikuceyuriti /
GSP33brssbh2u:2093: teṣāṃ punaranantānāṃ jīvāvayavānāṃ samānadeśatvaṃ pratihanyate vā naveti vaktavyam /
GSP33brssbh2u:2098: atha prayāyeṇa bṛhaccharīrapratipattau kecijjīvāvayavā upagacchanti tanuśarīrapratipattau ca kecidapagacchantītyucyeta tatrāpyucyate-
GSP33brssbh2u:2099: na ca paryāyād apy avirodho vikārādibhyaḥ |
GSP33brssbh2u:2103: avayavopagamāpagamābhyāṃ hyaniśamāpūryamāṇasyāpakṣīyamāṇasya ca jīvasya vikriyāvattvaṃ tāvadaparihāryam, vikriyāvattve ca carmādivadanityaṃ
GSP33brssbh2u:2105: tataśca bandhamokṣābhyupagamo bādhyeta karmāṣṭakapariveṣṭitasya jīvasyālābuvatsaṃsārasāgare nimagnasya bandhanocchedādūrdhvagāmitvaṃ bhavatīti /
GSP33brssbh2u:2111: āgacchantaścaite jīvāvayavāḥ kutaḥ prādurbhavantyapagacchantaśca kva vā līyanta iti vaktavyam
GSP33brssbh2u:2112: nahi bhūtebhyaḥ prādurbhaveyurbhūteṣu ca nilīyeran, abhautikatvājjīvasya /
GSP33brssbh2u:2113: nāpi kaścidanyaḥ sādhāraṇo 'sādhāraṇo vā jīvānāmavayavādhāro nirūpyate
GSP33brssbh2u:2119: athavā pūrveṇa sūtreṇa śarīraparimāṇasyātmana upacitāpacitaśarīrāntarapratipattāvakārtsnyaprasañjanadvāreṇānityatāyāṃ coditāyāṃ punaḥ paryāyeṇa parimāṇānavasthāne 'pi
GSP33brssbh2u:2121: yathā raktapaṭānāṃ vijñānānavasthāne 'pi tatsaṃtānanityatā tadvaddhisicāmapītyāśaṅkyānena sūtreṇottaramucyate /
GSP33brssbh2u:2130: athavāntyasya jīvaparimāṇasyāvasthitatvātpūrvayorapyavasthayoravasthitaparimāṇa eva jīvaḥ syāt, tataścāviśeṣeṇa sarvadaivāṇurmahānvā jīvo 'bhyupagantavyo na śarīraparimāṇaḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:2139: yadi punaraviśeṣeṇeśvarakāraṇavādamātramiha pratiṣidhyeta pūrvottaravirodhādvyāhatābhivyāhāraḥ sūtrakāra ityetadāpadyeta /
GSP33brssbh2u:2140: tasmādaprakṛtiradhiṣṭhātā kevalaṃ nimittakāraṇamīśvara ityeṣa pakṣo vedāntavihitabrahmaikatvapratipakṣatvādyatnenātra pratiṣidhyate /
GSP33brssbh2u:2142: kecittāvatsāṃkhyayogavyapāśrayāḥ kalpayanti pradhānapuruṣayoradhiṣṭhātā kevalaṃ nimittakāraṇamīśvara itaretaravilakṣaṇāḥ pradhānapuruṣeśvarā iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:2143: māheśvarāstu manyante kāryakāraṇayogavidhiduḥkhāntāḥ pañca padārthāḥ paśupatineśvareṇa paśupāśavimokṣaṇāyopadiṣṭāḥ paśupatirīśvaro nimittakāraṇamiti varṇayanti /
GSP33brssbh2u:2144: tathā vaiśeṣikādayo 'pi kecitkathañcitsvaprakriyānusāreṇa nimittakāraṇamīśvara iti varṇayanti
GSP33brssbh2u:2158: nahi kaścidadoṣaprayuktaḥ svārthe parārthe vā pravartamāno dṛśyate /
GSP33brssbh2u:2159: svārthaprayukta eva ca sarvo janaḥ parārthe 'pi pravartata
GSP33brssbh2u:2170: na tāvatsaṃyogalakṣaṇaḥ saṃbandhaḥ saṃbhavati, pradhānapuruṣeśvarāṇāṃ sarvagatatvānniravayavatvācca
GSP33brssbh2u:2177: apicāgamabalena brahmavādī kāraṇādisvarūpaṃ nirūpayatīti nāvaśyaṃ tasya yathādṛṣṭameva sarvamabhyupagantavyamiti niyamo 'sti /
GSP33brssbh2u:2178: parasya tu dṛṣṭāntabalena kāraṇādisvarūpaṃ nirūpayato yathādṛṣṭameva sarvamabhyupagantavyamityayamastyatiśayaḥ
GSP33brssbh2u:2186: sa hi parikalpyamānaḥ kumabhakāra iva mṛdādīni pradhānādīnyadhiṣṭhāya pravartayet /
GSP33brssbh2u:2188: nahyapratyakṣaṃ rūpādihīnaṃ ca pradhānamīśvarasyādhiṣṭheyaṃ saṃbhavati mṛdādivailakṣaṇyāt karaṇavac cen na bhogādibhyaḥ |
GSP33brssbh2u:2190: yathā karaṇagrāmaṃ cakṣurādikamapratyakṣaṃ rūpādihīnaṃ ca puruṣo
GSP33brssbh2u:2197: sādhiṣṭhāno hi loke saśarīro rājā rāṣṭrasyeśvaro dṛśyate na niradhiṣṭhānaḥ
GSP33brssbh2u:2198: ataśca taddṛṣṭāntavaśenādṛṣṭamīśvaraṃ kalpayitumicchata īśvarasyapi kiñciccharīraṃ karaṇāyatanaṃ varṇayitavyaṃ syāt /
GSP33brssbh2u:2204: atha lokadarśanānusāreṇeśvarasyāpi kiñcitkāraṇānāmāyatanaṃ śarīraṃ kāmena kalpyeta /
GSP33brssbh2u:2213: anantaṃ ca pradhānamanantāśca puruṣā mitho bhinnā abhyupagamyate /
GSP33brssbh2u:2214: tatra sarvajñeśvareṇa pradhānasya puruṣāṇāmātmanaśceyattā paricchidyeta vā na vā paricchidyeta
GSP33brssbh2u:2218: yaddhi loka iyattāparicchinnaṃ vastu paṭādi tadantavaddṛṣṭaṃ tathā pradhānapuruṣeśvaratrayamapīyattāparicchinnatvādantavatsyāt
GSP33brssbh2u:2222: tataśceyattāparicchinnānāṃ madhye ye saṃsāriṇaḥ saṃsārānmucyante teṣāṃ saṃsāro 'ntavānsaṃsāritvaṃ ca teṣāmantavat /
GSP33brssbh2u:2223: evamitareṣvapi krameṇa mucyamāneṣu saṃsārasya saṃsāriṇāṃ cāntavattvaṃ syāt
GSP33brssbh2u:2224: pradhānaṃ ca savikāraṃ puruṣārthamīśvarasyādhiṣṭheyaṃ saṃsāritvenābhimataṃ tacchūnyatāyāmīśvaraḥ kimadhitiṣṭhet /
GSP33brssbh2u:2228: atha mā bhūdeṣa doṣa ityuttaro vikalpo 'bhyupagamyeta na pradhānasya puruṣāṇāmātmanaśceyatteśvareṇa paricchidyata iti, tata īśvarasya sarvajñatvābhyupagamahāniraparo doṣaḥ prasajyeta /
GSP33brssbh2u:2237: nanu śrutisamāśrayaṇenāpyevaṃrūpa eveśvaraḥ prāṅnirdhāritaḥ prakṛtiścādhiṣṭhātā ceti /
GSP33brssbh2u:2240: ucyate- yadyapyevajātīyakoṃ'śaḥ samānatvānna visaṃvādagocaro bhavattyastitvaṃśāntaraṃ visaṃvādasthānamityatastatpratyākhyānāyāramabhaḥ tatra bhāgavatā manyante /
GSP33brssbh2u:2241: bhagavānevaiko vāsudevo nirañjanajñānasvarūpaḥ paramārthatattvaṃ, sa caturdhātmānaṃ pravibhajya pratiṣṭhito vāsudevavyūharūpeṇa saṃkarṣaṇavyūharūpeṇa pradyumnavyūharūpeṇāniruddhavyūharūpeṇa ca /
GSP33brssbh2u:2246: teṣāṃ vāsudevaḥ parā parakṛtiritare saṃkarṣaṇādayaḥ kāryam /
GSP33brssbh2u:2247: tamitthaṃbhūtaṃ parameśvaraṃ bhagavantamabhigamanopādānejyāsvādhyāyayogairvarṣaśatamiṣṭvā kṣīṇakleśo bhagavantameva pratipadyata iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:2248: tatra yattāvaducyeta yo 'sau nārāyaṇaḥ paro 'vyaktātprasiddhaḥ paramātmā sarvātmā sa ātmānātmānamanekadhā vyūhyāvasthita iti, tanna nirākriyate,
GSP33brssbh2u:2249: 'sa ekadhā bhavati tridhā bhavati' (chā. 7.26.2) ityādiśrutibhyaḥ paramātmano 'nekadhābhāvasyādhigatatvāt
GSP33brssbh2u:2254: yatpunaridamucyate vāsudevātsaṃkarṣaṇa utpadyate saṃkarṣaṇācca pradyumnaḥ pradyumnāccāniruddha iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:2266: pūjādravyāṇāmarjanamupādānam, ijyā pūjā, svādhyāyo 'ṣṭākṣarādijapaḥ, yogo dhyānam /
GSP33brssbh2u:2269: yasmānna hi loke karturdevadattādeḥ karaṇaṃ paraśvādyutpadyamānaṃ dṛśyate
GSP33brssbh2u:2270: varṇayanti ca bhāgavatāḥ karturjīvātsaṃkarṣaṇasaṃjñakātkaraṇaṃ manaḥ pradyumnasaṃjñakamutpadyate
GSP33brssbh2u:2275: athāpi syānna caite saṃkarṣaṇādayo jīvādibhāvenābhipreyante kiṃ tarhīśvarā evaite sarve jñānaiśvaryaśaktibalavīryatejobhiraiśvaryairdharmairanvitā abhyupagamyante vāsudevā evaite sarve nirdeṣā niradhiṣṭhāna niravadyāśceti /
GSP33brssbh2u:2280: yadi tāvadayamabhiprāyaḥ parasparabhinnā evaite vāsudevādayaścatvāra īśvarāstulyadharmāṇo naiṣāmekātmakatvamastīti, tato
GSP33brssbh2u:2284: athāyamabhiprāya ekasyaiva bhagavata ete catvāro vyūhāstulyadharmāṇa iti,
GSP33brssbh2u:2286: nahi vāsudevātsaṃkarṣaṇasyotpattiḥ saṃbhavati saṃkarṣaṇācca pradyumnasya pradyumnāccāniruddhasya, atiśayābhāvāt /
GSP33brssbh2u:2290: vāsudevā eva hi sarve vyūhā nirviśeṣā iṣyante /
GSP33brssbh2u:2293: FN: nirdeṣā rāgādiśūnyāḥ, niradhiṣṭhānā prakṛtyajanyāḥ, niravadyā nāśādirahitā ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:2296: jñānaiśvaryaśaktibalavīryatejāṃsi guṇāḥ, ātmāna evaite bhagavanto vāsudevā ityādidarśanāt
GSP33brssbh2u:2298: caturṣu vedeṣu paraṃ śreyo 'labdhvā śāṇḍilya idaṃ śāstramadhigatavānityādivedanindādarśanāt
GSP33brssbh2u:2300: iti śrīgovindabhagavatpūjyapādaśiṣyaśrīmacchaṅkarabhagavatpūjyapādakṛtau śārīrakamīmāṃsābhāṣye dvitīyādhyāyasya dvitīyaḥ pādaḥ samāptaḥ // 2 //
GSP33brssbh2u:2301: iti dvitīyādhyāyasya sāṃkhyādimatānāṃ duṣṭatvapradarśanaṃ nāma dvitīyaḥ pādaḥ //
GSP33brssbh2u:2307: vedānteṣu tatra tatra bhinnaprasthānā utpattiśrutaya upalabhyante /
GSP33brssbh2u:2312: vipratiṣedhācca parapakṣāṇāmanapekṣitatvaṃ sthāpitaṃ tadvatsvapakṣasyāpi vipratiṣedhādevānapekṣitatvamāśaṅkyetetyataḥ sarvavedāntagatasṛṣṭiśrutyarthanirmalatvāya paraḥ paprañca ārabhyate /
GSP33brssbh2u:2314: tatra prathamaṃ tāvadākāśamāśritya cintyate kimasyākāśasyotpattirastyuta nāstīti /
GSP33brssbh2u:2320: chāndogye hi 'sadeva somyedamagra āsīdekamevādvitīyam' (chā. 6.2.1) iti sacchabdavācyaṃ brahma prakṛtya 'tadaikṣata', 'tattejo 'sṛjata' (chā.
GSP33brssbh2u:2321: 6.2.3) iti ca pañcānāṃ mahābhūtānāṃ madhyamaṃ teja ādiṅkṛtvā trayāṇāṃ tejobannānāmutpattiḥ śrāvyate /
GSP33brssbh2u:2327: mā nāmākāśasya chāndogye bhūdutpattiḥ, śrutyantare tvasti /
GSP33brssbh2u:2328: taittirīyakā hi samāmananti- 'satyaṃ jñānamantaṃ brahma' iti prakṛtya 'tasmādvā etasmādātmana ākāśaḥ saṃbhūtaḥ' (tai. 2.1) iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:2336: nanu sakṛcchrutasyāpi kartuḥ kartavyadvayena saṃbandho dṛśyate,yathā sūpaṃ paktvaudanaṃ pacatīti, evaṃ tadākāśaṃ sṛṣṭvā tattejo 'sṛjatīti yojayiṣyāmi
GSP33brssbh2u:2338: prathamajatvaṃ hi chāndogye tejaso 'vagamyate taittirīyake cākāśasya /
GSP33brssbh2u:2341: 'tasmādvā etasmādātmana ākāśaḥ saṃbhūtaḥ' (tai. 2.1) ityatrāpi tasmādākāśaḥ saṃbhūtastasmāttejaḥ saṃbhūtamiti sakṛcchrutasyāpādānasya saṃbhavanasya ca viyattejobhyāṃ yugapatsaṃbandhānupapatteḥ 'vāyoragniḥ' (tai. 2.1) iti ca pṛthagāmnānāt // 2 //
GSP33brssbh2u:2345: yā tvitarā viyadutpattivādinī śrutirudāhṛtā sā gauṇī bhavitumarhati /
GSP33brssbh2u:2351: dravyasya caikajātīyakamanekaṃ ca dravyaṃ samavāyikāraṇaṃ bhavati /
GSP33brssbh2u:2353: yasminsamavāyikāraṇe satyasamavāyikāraṇe ca tatsaṃyoga ākāśa utpadyeta /
GSP33brssbh2u:2355: utpattimatāṃ ca tejaḥprabhṛtīnāṃ pūrvottarakāyorviśeṣaḥ saṃbhāvyate prāgutpatteḥ prakāśādikāryaṃ na babhūva paścācca bhavatīti /
GSP33brssbh2u:2359: tasmādyathā loka ākāśaṃ kurvākāśo jāta ityevañjātīyako gauṇaḥ prayogo bhavati, yathāca ghaṭākāśaḥ karakākāśo gṛhākāśa ityekasyāpyākāśasyaivañjātīyako bhedavyapadeśo gauṇo bhavati, vede 'pi
GSP33brssbh2u:2365: ākāśavatsarvagataśca nityaḥ iti cākāśena brahma sarvagatatvanityatvābhyāṃ dharmābhyāmupamimāna ākāśasyāpi tau dharmau sūcayati /
GSP33brssbh2u:2367: 'sa yathānanto 'yamākāśa evamananta ātmā veditavyaḥ' iti codāharaṇam /
GSP33brssbh2u:2374: kathaṃ punarekasya saṃbhūtaśabdasya 'tasmādvā etasmādātmana ākāśaḥ saṃbhūtaḥ' (tai.
GSP33brssbh2u:2375: 2.1) ityasminnadhikāre pareṣu tejaḥprabhṛtiṣvanuvartamānasya mukhyatvaṃ saṃbhavatyākāśe ca gauṇatvamiti /
GSP33brssbh2u:2378: yathaikasyāpi brahmaśabdasya 'tapasā brahma vijijñāsasva, tapo brahma'
GSP33brssbh2u:2379: (tai. 3.2) ityasminnadhikāre 'nnādiṣu gauṇaḥ prayoga ānande ca mukhyaḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:2380: yathā ca tapasi brahmavijñānasādhane brahmaśabdo bhaktyā prayujyate 'ñjasā
GSP33brssbh2u:2382: kathaṃ punaranutpattau nabhasaḥ 'ekamevādvitīyam' (chā. 6.2.1) itīyaṃ pratijñā samarthyate
GSP33brssbh2u:2383: nanu nabhasā dvitīyena sadvitīyaṃ brahma prāpnoti /
GSP33brssbh2u:2384: kathaṃ ca brahmaṇi vidite sarvaṃ viditaṃ syāditi /
GSP33brssbh2u:2386: yathā loke kaścitkumbhakārakule pūrvedyurmṛddaṇḍacakrādīni copalabhyāparedyuśca nānāvidhānyamatrāṇi prasāritānyupalabhya brūyānmṛdevaikākinī pūrvedyurāsīditi sa ca tayāvadhāraṇayā mṛtkāryajātameva pūrvedyurnāsīdityabhipreyānna daṇḍacakrādi,
GSP33brssbh2u:2388: yathā mṛdo 'matraprakṛteḥ kumbhakāro 'dhiṣṭhātā dṛśyate naivaṃ brahmaṇo
GSP33brssbh2u:2390: naca nabhasāpi dvitīyena sadvitīyaṃ brahma prasajyate /
GSP33brssbh2u:2393: sargakāle tu brahma jagadutpādayituṃ yatate stimitamitaravattiṣṭati /
GSP33brssbh2u:2399: brahmaṇā cāvyatiriktadeśakālamevākāśaṃ bhavatīti, ato brahmaṇā tatkāryeṇa
GSP33brssbh2u:2401: yathā kṣīrapūrṇe ghaṭe katicidabbindavaḥ prakṣiptāḥ santaḥ kṣīragrahaṇenaiva gṛhītā bhavanti, nahi kṣīraprahaṇādabbindavugrahaṇaṃ pariśiṣyate, evaṃ brahmaṇā tatkāryaiścāvyatiriktadeśakālatvādgṛhītameva
GSP33brssbh2u:2410: iti, 'ātmani khalvare dṛṣṭe śrute mate vijñāta idaṃ sarvaṃ viditam' (bṛ.
GSP33brssbh2u:2411: 4.5.6) iti, 'kasminnu bhagavo vijñāte sarvamidaṃ vijñātaṃ bhavati' (muṇḍa.
GSP33brssbh2u:2412: 1.1.3) iti, 'na kācana maddhahirdhā vidyāsti' iti caivaṃrūpā prativedāntaṃ
GSP33brssbh2u:2414: tasyāḥ pratijñāyā evamahāniranuparodhaḥ syāt, yadyavyatirekaḥ kṛtsnasya vastujātasya vijñeyādbrahmaṇaḥ syāt /
GSP33brssbh2u:2415: vyatireke hi satyekavijñānena sarvaṃ vijñāyata itīyaṃ pratijñā hrīyeta /
GSP33brssbh2u:2416: sa cāvyatireka evamupapadyate yadi kṛtsnaṃ vastujātamekasmādbrahmaṇa utpadyeta /
GSP33brssbh2u:2418: tathāhi- 'yenāśrutaṃ śrutaṃ bhavati' iti pratijñāya mṛdādidṛṣṭāntaiḥ
GSP33brssbh2u:2424: tadyadyākāśaṃ na brahmakāryaṃ syānna brahmaṇi vijñāta ākāśaṃ vijñāyeta,
GSP33brssbh2u:2427: tathāhi- prativedāntaṃ te te śabdāstena tena dṛṣṭāntena tāmeva pratijñāṃ khyapayanti 'idaṃ sarvaṃ yadayamātmā' (bṛ. 2.4.6),' brahmaivedamamṛtaṃ
GSP33brssbh2u:2431: viyadutpattiviṣayaśrutyantarasya darśitatvāt 'tasmādvā etasmādātmana ākāśaḥ saṃbhūtaḥ' (tai. 2.1) iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:2437: iha tu virodha uktaḥ, sakṛcchrutasya sraṣṭuḥ sraṣṭavyadvayasaṃbandhāsaṃbhavāddvayośca prathamajatvāsaṃbhavādvikalpāsaṃbhavācceti
GSP33brssbh2u:2439: tejaḥsargasya taittirīyake tṛtīyatvaśravaṇāt 'tasmādvā etasmādātmana ākāśaḥ saṃbhūtaḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:2443: śakyā tu pariṇetuṃ chāndogyaśrutistadākāśaṃ vāyuṃ ca sṛṣṭvā 'tattejo
GSP33brssbh2u:2445: nahīyaṃ śrutistejojanipradhānā satī śrutyantaraprasiddhāmākāśasyotpattiṃ vārayituṃ śaknoti
GSP33brssbh2u:2451: yathāca 'sarvaṃ khalvidaṃ brahma tajjalān' (chā. 3.14.1) ityatra sākṣādeva sarvasya vastujātasya brahmajatvaṃ śrūyamāṇaṃ na pradeśāntaravihitaṃ
GSP33brssbh2u:2452: tejaḥpramukhamutpattikramaṃ vārayati, evaṃ tejaso 'pi brahmajatvaṃ śrūyamāṇaṃ na śrutyantaravihitaṃ nabhaḥpramukhamutpattikramaṃ vārayitumarhati /
GSP33brssbh2u:2453: nanu śamavidhānārthametadvākyam, 'tajjalāniti śānta upāsīta' iti śruteḥ,
GSP33brssbh2u:2458: nahi tejaḥprāthamyānurodhena śrutyantaraprasiddho viyatpadārthaḥ parityaktavyo bhavati, padārthadharmatvātkramasya
GSP33brssbh2u:2459: apica 'tattejo 'sṛjata' iti nātra kramasya vācakaḥ kaścicchabdo 'sti /
GSP33brssbh2u:2461: sa ca 'vāyoragniḥ' ityanena śrutyantaraprasiddhena krameṇa nivāryate /
GSP33brssbh2u:2464: apica chāndogye 'yenāśrutaṃ śrutaṃ bhavati' ityetāṃ pratijñāṃ vākyopakrame
GSP33brssbh2u:2465: śrutāṃ samarthayitumasamāmnātamapi viyadutpattāvupasaṃkhyātavyaṃ, kimaṅga punastaittirīyake samāmnātaṃ nabho na saṃgṛhyate /
GSP33brssbh2u:2466: yaccoktamākāśasya sarveṇānanyadeśakālatvādbrahmaṇā tatkāryaiśca saha viditameva tadbhavatyato na pratijñā hīyate, naca 'ekamevādvitīyam' iti śrutikopo bhavati, kṣīrodakavadbrahmanabhasoravyatirekopapatteriti atrocyate /
GSP33brssbh2u:2469: kṣīrodakanyāyena ca sarvavijñānaṃ kalpyamānaṃ na samyagvijñānaṃ syāt /
GSP33brssbh2u:2474: naca svakāryāpekṣayedaṃ vastvekadeśaviṣayaṃ sarvavijñānamekamevādvitīyatāvadhāraṇaṃ ceti nyāyyaṃ, mṛdādiṣvapi hi tatsaṃbhavānna tadapūrvavadupanyasitavyaṃ bhavati 'śvetaketo yannu somyedaṃ mahāmanā anūcānamānī stabdho 'syuta tamādeśamaprākṣyo 'yenāśrutaṃ
GSP33brssbh2u:2476: tasmādaśeṣavastuviṣayamevedaṃ sarvavijñānaṃ sarvasya brahmakāryatāpekṣayopanyasyata iti draṣṭavyam yatpunaretaduktamasaṃbhavād gauṇī ganasyotpattiśrutiriti /
GSP33brssbh2u:2481: yato yāvatkiñcidvikārajātaṃ dṛśyate ghaṭaghaṭikodañcanādi vā kaṭakakeyūrakuṇḍalādi vā sūcīnārācanistriṃśādi vā tāvāneva vibhāgo loke lakṣyate /
GSP33brssbh2u:2486: nanvātmāpyākāśādibhyo vibhakta iti tasyāpi kāryatvaṃ ghaṭādivatprāpnoti /
GSP33brssbh2u:2489: yadi hyātmāpi vikāraḥ syāttasmātparamanyanna śrutamityākāśādi sarvaṃ kāryaṃ nirātmakamātmanaḥ kāryatve syāt /
GSP33brssbh2u:2498: āgantukaṃ hi vastu nirākriyate na svarūpam /
GSP33brssbh2u:2499: ya eva hi nirākartā tadeva tasya svarūpam /
GSP33brssbh2u:2501: tathāhamevedānīṃ jānāmi vartamānaṃ vastvahamevātītamatītataraṃ cājñāsiṣamahamevānāgatamanāgatataraṃ ca jñāsyāmītyatītānāgatavartamānabhāvenānyathābhavatyapi jñātavye na jñāturanyathābhāvo 'sati, sarvadā vartamānasvabhāvatvāt /
GSP33brssbh2u:2502: tathā bhasmībhavatyapi dehe cātmana ucchedo vartamānasvabhāvādanyathāsvabhāvatvaṃ vā na saṃbhāvayituṃ śakyam /
GSP33brssbh2u:2505: tatpratyucyate- na tāvatsamānajātīyamevārabhate na bhinnajātīyamiti niyamo 'sti /
GSP33brssbh2u:2510: samavāyikāraṇaviṣaya eva samānajātīyatvābhyupagamo na kāraṇāntaraviṣaya iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:2518: ekaiko hi paramāṇirmanaścāyaṃ karmārabhate na dravyāntaraiḥ saṃhatyetyabhyupagamyate /
GSP33brssbh2u:2522: bhavedeṣa niyamo yadi saṃyogasacivaṃ dravyaṃ dravyāntarasyārambhakamabhyupagamyeta /
GSP33brssbh2u:2523: tadeva tu dravyaṃ viśeṣavadavasthāntaramāpadyamānaṃ kāryaṃ nāmābhyupagamyate /
GSP33brssbh2u:2530: yaccoktamākāśasyotpattau na pūrvottarakālayorviśeṣaḥ saṃbhāvayituṃ śakyata iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:2532: yenaiva hi viśeṣeṇa pṛthivyādibhyo vyatiricyamānaṃ nabhaḥ svarūpavadidānīmadhyavasīyate sa eva viśeṣaḥ prāgutpatternāsīditi gamyate
GSP33brssbh2u:2533: yathā ca brahma na sthūlādibhiḥ pṛthivyādisvabhāvaiḥ svabhāvavat,
GSP33brssbh2u:2547: 'ākāśavatsarvagataśca nityaḥ' ityapi prasiddhamahattvenākāśenopamānaṃ kriyate niratiśayamahattvāya nākāśasamatvāya /
GSP33brssbh2u:2548: yatheṣuriva savitā dhāvatīti kṣipragatitvāyocyate neṣutulyagatitvāya tadvat /
GSP33brssbh2u:2566: asti tu taittirīyāṇāmutpattiprakaraṇa āmnānam 'ākāśādvāyuḥ' (tai. 2.1) iti pakṣāntaram /
GSP33brssbh2u:2574: nanu vāyorākāśasya ca tulyayorutpattiprakaraṇe śravaṇāśravaṇayorekamevādhikaraṇamubhayaviṣayamastu kimatideśenāsati viśeṣa iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:2584: tathā vikārebhya evākāśādibhya uttareṣāṃ vikārāṇāmutpattimupaśrutyākāśasyāpi vikārādeva brahmaṇa utpattiriti kaścinmanyeta /
GSP33brssbh2u:2586: na khalu brahmaṇaḥ sadātmakasya kutaścidanyataḥ saṃbhava utpattirāśaṅkitavyā /
GSP33brssbh2u:2590: na tasya sanmātrādevotpattiḥ saṃbhavati, asatyatiśaye prakṛtivikārabhāvānupapatteḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:2592: sāmānyāddhi viśeṣā utpadyamānā dṛśyante mṛdāderghaṭādayo natu viśeṣebhyaḥ sāmānyam /
GSP33brssbh2u:2595: 'sa kāraṇaṃ karaṇādhipādhipo na cāsya kaścijjanitā na cādhipaḥ' (śve. 6.9)
GSP33brssbh2u:2597: vivatvapavanayoḥ punarutpattiḥ pradarśitā natu brahmaṇaḥ sāstīti vaiṣamyam
GSP33brssbh2u:2598: naca vikārebhyo vikārāntarotpattidarśanādbrahmaṇo 'pi vikāratvaṃ bhavitumarhatīti mūlaprakṛtyanabhyupagame 'navastāprasaṅgāt /
GSP33brssbh2u:2599: yā mūlaprakṛtirabhyupagamyate tadeva ca no brahmetyavirodhaḥ // 9 //
GSP33brssbh2u:2603: chāndogye sanmūlatvaṃ tejasaḥ śrāvitaṃ, taittirīyake tu vāyumūlatvaṃ,
GSP33brssbh2u:2604: tatra tejoyoniṃ prati śrutivipratipattau satyāṃ prāptaṃ tāvadbrahmayonikaṃ teja iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:2613: tasmāt 'vāyoragniḥ' iti kramopadeśo draṣṭavyo vāyoranantaramagniḥ saṃbhūta iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:2614: evaṃ prāpta ucyate- tejo 'to mātariśvano jāyata iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:2617: avyavahite hi tejaso brahmajatve satyasati vāyujatve vāyoragniritīyaṃ śrutiḥ kadarthitā syāt
GSP33brssbh2u:2619: neti brūmaḥ - 'tasmādvā etasmādātmana ākāśaḥ saṃbhūtaḥ' (tai. 2.1.1) iti purastātsaṃbhavatyapādānasyātmanaḥ pañcamīnirdeśātsa, tasyaiva ca saṃbhavaterihādhikārāt, parastādapi ca tadadhikāre 'pṛthivyā oṣadhayaḥ'
GSP33brssbh2u:2621: apica vāyorūrdhvamagniḥ saṃbhūta iti kalpya upapadārthayogaḥ kḷptastu kārakārthayogo vāyoragni saṃbhūta iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:2626: yadāpi hyākāśaṃ vāyuṃ ca sṛṣṭvā vāyubhāvāpannaṃ brahma tejo 'sṛjateti
GSP33brssbh2u:2627: kalpyate, tadāpi brahmajatvaṃ tejaso na virudhyate /
GSP33brssbh2u:2628: yathā tasyāḥ śrutaṃ tasyā dadhi tasyā āmikṣetyādi /
GSP33brssbh2u:2632: ityādyanukramya 'bhavati bhāvā bhūtānāṃ matta eva pṛthagvidhāḥ' (bha.gī.
GSP33brssbh2u:2634: yadyapi buddhyādayaḥ svakāraṇebhyaḥ pratyakṣaṃ bhavanto dṛśyante tathāpi sarvasya bhāvajātasya sākṣātpraṇāḍyā veśvaravaṃśyatvāt /
GSP33brssbh2u:2641: tasyā dhenoḥ śrutaṃ taptaṃ kṣīraṃ sākṣātkāryaṃ, dadhyādikaṃ tu pāramparyajamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:2650: tathāhyāha- 'tadapo 'sṛjata' iti 'agnerāpaḥ' iti ca vacane nāsti saṃśayaḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:2651: tejasastu sṛṣṭiṃ vyākhyāya pṛthivyā vyākhyāsyannapo 'ntariyāmityāpa iti sūtrayāṃbabhūva // 6 pṛthivyadhikārādhikaraṇam /
GSP33brssbh2u:2654: 'tā āpa aikṣanta bahvayaḥ syāma prajāyemahīti tā annamasṛjanta' (chā.
GSP33brssbh2u:2656: tatra saṃśayaḥ - kimanenānnaśabdena vrīhiyavādyabhyavahāryai caudanādyucyate kiṃ vā pṛthivīti
GSP33brssbh2u:2660: vrīhiyavādyeva hi sati varṣaṇe bahu bhavati na pṛthivīti /
GSP33brssbh2u:2661: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ pṛthivyeveyamannaśabdenādbhyo jāyamānā vivakṣyata iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:2665: tatra kramaprāptāṃ pṛthivīṃ mahābhūtaṃ vilaṅghya nākasmādvrīhyādiparigraho nyāyyaḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:2666: tathā rūpamapi vākyaśeṣe pṛthivyanuguṇaṃ dṛśyate 'yatkṛṣṇaṃ tadannasya' iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:2670: nanu pṛthivyā api naiva kṛṣṇatvaniyamo 'sti payaḥpāṇḍurasyāṅgārarohitasya ca kṣetrasya darśanāt
GSP33brssbh2u:2673: bhūyiṣṭhaṃ hi pṛthivyāḥ kṛṣṇaṃ rūpaṃ na tathā śvetarohite /
GSP33brssbh2u:2675: sā ca kṛṣṇābhāsetyataḥ kṛṣṇaṃ rūpaṃ pṛthivyā iti śliṣyate /
GSP33brssbh2u:2677: 'tadyadapāṃ śara āsīttatsamahanyata sā pṛthivyabhavat' (bṛ. 1.2.2) iti ca /
GSP33brssbh2u:2678: pṛthivyāstu vrīhyāderutpattiṃ darśayati- 'pṛthivyā oṣadhaya oṣadhībhyo 'nnam' iti ca /
GSP33brssbh2u:2679: evamadhikārādiṣu pṛthivyāḥ pratipādakeṣu satsu kuto vrīhyādipratipattiḥ /
