GSP33brssbh2u:3453: karmātmā tvaparo yo 'sau mokṣabandhanaiḥ sa yujyate /
GSP33brssbh2u:3454: sa saptadaśakenāpi rāśinā yujyate punaḥ' iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:3459: atrāha- yadi tarhyeka eva sarveṣāṃ bhūtānāmantarātmā syātkathamanujñāparihārau syātāṃ lokikau vaidikau ceti /
GSP33brssbh2u:3465: 'mṛtyoḥ sa mṛtyumāpnoti ya iha nāneva paśyati' (bṛ. 4.4.19), 'tattvamasi'
GSP33brssbh2u:3468: syādetadevaṃ yadyubhāvapi bhedābhedau pratipipādayiṣitau syātām, abheda eva tvatra pratipipādayiṣito brahmātmatvapratipattau puruṣārthasiddheḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:3470: naca niravayavasya brahmaṇo mukhyoṃ'śo jīvaḥ saṃbhavatītyuktam /
GSP33brssbh2u:3471: tasmātparaḥ evaikaḥ sarveṣāṃ bhūtānāmantarātmā jīvabhāvenāvasthita ityato vaktavyānujñāparihāropapattiḥ FN: tatra jīvaparayormadhye /
GSP33brssbh2u:3473: saptadaśakena daśendrayāṇi pañca prāṇaḥ mano buddiśceti saptadaśasaṃkhyāko rāśirliṅgam /
GSP33brssbh2u:3474: mṛtyoḥ sa mṛtyu - iha brahmaṇi yo nāneva kalpitabhedaśāli cetanācetanātmakaṃ viśvaṃ paśyati sa mṛtyoranantaraṃ mṛtyuṃ
GSP33brssbh2u:3503: satyaṃ vyatirekadarśino niyojyatvaṃ tathāpi vyomādivaddehādyasaṃhatatvamapaśyata evātmano niyojyatvābhimānaḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:3511: yathāca prakāśa ekasyāpi savituramedhyadeśasaṃbaddhaḥ parihriyate netaraḥ śucibhūmiṣṭhaḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:3514: yathā mūtraparīṣaṃ gavāṃ pavitratayā parigṛhyate tadeva jātyantare parivarjyate tadvat // FN: pratatā saṃtatā /
GSP33brssbh2u:3519: yatsvayaṃ karmaphalasaṃbandhaḥ sa caikātmyābhyupagame vyatikīryeta svāmyekatvāditi cet /
GSP33brssbh2u:3522: nahi kartṛbhoktṛścātmanaḥ saṃtataḥ sarvaiḥ śarīraiḥ saṃbandho 'sti /
GSP33brssbh2u:3525: tataśca karmavyatikaraḥ phalavyatikaro vā na bhaviṣyati // 49 //
GSP33brssbh2u:3527: ābhāsa eva caiṣa jīvaḥ parasyātmano jalasūryakādivatpratipattavyaḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:3530: ataśca yathā naikasmiñjalasūryake kampamāne jalasūryakāntaraṃ kampate,
GSP33brssbh2u:3535: yeṣāṃ tu bahava ātmānaste ca sarve sarvagatāsteṣāmevaiṣa vyatikaraḥ prāpnoti /
GSP33brssbh2u:3537: bahavo vibhavaścātmānaścaitanyamātrasvarūpā nirguṇā niratiśayāśca tadarthaṃ sādhāraṇaṃ pradhānaṃ tannimittaiṣāṃ bhogāpavargasiddhiriti sāṃkhyāḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:3538: sati bahutve vibhutve ca ghaṭakuḍyādisamānā dravyamātrasvarūpāḥ svato
GSP33brssbh2u:3540: tatrātmadravyāṇāṃ manodravyāṇāṃ ca saṃyogānnavecchādayo vaiśeṣikā ātmaguṇā utpadyante /
GSP33brssbh2u:3541: te cāvyatirekeṇa pratyekamātmasu samavayanti sa saṃsāraḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:3543: tatra sāṃkhyānāṃ tāvaccaitanyasvarūpatvātsarvātmanāṃ saṃnidhānādyaviśeṣāccaikasya sukhaduḥkhasaṃbandhe sarveṣāṃ sukhaduḥkhasaṃbandhaḥ prāpnoti /
GSP33brssbh2u:3551: asatyāṃ punarupapattau kāmaṃ mā bhūdabhilaṣitaṃ puruṣakaivalyaṃ, prāpnoti tu vyavasthāhetvabhāvādvyatikaraḥ
GSP33brssbh2u:3552: kāṇādānāmapi yadaikenātmanā manaḥ saṃyujyate tadātmāntarairapi nāntarīyakaḥ saṃyogaḥ syātsaṃnidhānādyaviśeṣāt
GSP33brssbh2u:3553: tataśca hetvaviśeṣātphalāviśeṣa ityekasyātmanaḥ sukhaduḥkhayoge sarvātmanāmapi samānaṃ sukhaduḥkhitvaṃ prasajyeta // 50 //
GSP33brssbh2u:3559: sāṃkhyānāṃ tāvattadanātmasamavāyi pradhānavarti pradhānasādhāraṇyānna pratyātmaṃ sukhaduḥkhopabhogasya niyāmakamupapadyate /
GSP33brssbh2u:3560: kāṇādānāmapi pūrvavatsādhāraṇenātmamanaḥsaṃyogena nirvartitasyādṛṣṭasyāpyasyaivātmana idamadṛṣṭamiti niyame hetvabhāvādeṣa eva doṣaḥ // 51 //
GSP33brssbh2u:3562: ahamidaṃ phalaṃ prāpnavānīdaṃ pariharāṇītthaṃ prayatā itthaṃ karavāṇītyevaṃvidhā abhisaṃdhyādayaḥ pratyātmaṃ pravartamānā adṛṣṭasyātmanāṃ ca svasvāmibhāvaṃ niyaṃsyantīti /
GSP33brssbh2u:3565: abhisaṃdhyādīnāmapi sādhāraṇenaivātmamanaḥsaṃyogena sarvātmasaṃnidhau kriyamāṇānāṃ niyamahetutvānupapatteruktadoṣānuṣaṅga eva // 52 //
GSP33brssbh2u:3568: śarīrāvacchinna evātmapradeśe bhaviṣyatīti ataḥ pradeśakṛtā vyavasthābhisaṃdhyādīnāmadṛṣṭasya sukhaduḥkhayośca bhaviṣyatīti /
GSP33brssbh2u:3573: tatra na vaiśeṣikaiḥ śarīrāvacchinno 'pyātmānaḥ pradeśaḥ kalpayituṃ śakyaḥ
GSP33brssbh2u:3574: kalpyamāno 'pyayaṃ niṣpradeśasyātmanaḥ pradeśaḥ kālpanikatvādeva na pāramārthikaṃ kāryaṃ niyantuṃ śaknoti /
GSP33brssbh2u:3575: śarīramapi sarvātmasaṃnidhāvutpadyamānamasyaivātmano netareṣāmiti na niyantuṃ śakyam /
GSP33brssbh2u:3579: tathāhi- devadatto yasminpradeśe sukhaduḥkhamanvabhūttasmātpradeśādapakrānte taccharīre yajñadattaśarīre ca taṃ pradeśamanuprāpte tasyāpītareṇa samānaḥ sukhaduḥkhānubhavo dṛśyate sa na syādyadi devadattayajñadattayoḥ samānapradeśamaniṣṭaṃ na syāt /
GSP33brssbh2u:3593: iti śrīgovindabhagavatpūjyapādaśiṣyaśrīmacchaṅkarabhagavatpūjyapādakṛtau śrīśārīrakamīmāṃsābhāṣye dvitīyādhyāyasya tṛtīyaḥ pādaḥ samāptaḥ // 3 //
GSP33brssbh2u:3601: 'tatra tāvat tattejo 'sṛjata' (chāndo. 6.2.3) iti, 'tasmādvā etasmādātmana ākāśaḥ saṃbhūtaḥ' (taitti. 2.1.1) iti caivamādiṣūtpattiprakaraṇeṣu prāṇānāmutpajirnāmnāyate kvaciccānutpattirevaiṣāmāmnāyate 'asadvā idamagra
GSP33brssbh2u:3604: prāṇā vāva ṛṣayaḥ' ityatra prāgutpatteḥ prāṇānāṃ sadbhāvaśravaṇāt /
GSP33brssbh2u:3605: anyatra tu prāṇānāmapyutpattiḥ paṭhyate- 'yathāgnerjvalataḥ kṣudrā visphuliṅgā vyuccarantyevamevaitasmādātmanaḥ sarve prāṇāḥ' iti,
GSP33brssbh2u:3607: prāṇāḥ prabhavanti tasmāt' (mu. 2.1.8) iti, 'sa prāṇamasṛjata prāṇācchraddhāṃ khaṃ vāyurjyotirāpaḥ pṛthivīndriyaṃ mano 'nnam' (pra. 6.4)
GSP33brssbh2u:3616: adṛṣṭasāmyapratipādanārthamiti yadyucyeta, yathādṛṣṭasya sarvātmasaṃnidhāvutpadyamānasyāniyatatvamevaṃ prāṇānāmapi sarvātmanaḥ pratyaniyatatvamiti /
GSP33brssbh2u:3624: atra prāṇotpattivādivākyajātamujadāharaṇam- 'etasmādātmanaḥ sarve prāṇāḥ sarve lokāḥ sarve devāḥ sarvāṇi bhūtāni vyuccaranti' (bṛ. 2.1.20)
GSP33brssbh2u:3626: tatra yathā lokādayaḥ parasmādbrahmaṇa utpadyante tathā prāṇā apītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:3627: tathā- 'etasmājjāyate prāṇo manaḥ sarvendriyāṇi ca khaṃ vāyurjyotirāpaḥ
GSP33brssbh2u:3628: pṛthivī viśvasya dhāriṇī' (muṇḍa. 2.1.3) ityevamādiṣvapi khādivatprāṇānāmutpattiriti draṣṭavyam
GSP33brssbh2u:3630: yathātītānantarapādādyuktā viyadādayaḥ parasya brahmaṇo vikārāḥ samadhigatāstathā prāṇā api parasya brahmaṇo vikārā iti yojayitavyam /
GSP33brssbh2u:3633: nanu keṣucitpradeśeṣu na prāṇānāmutpattiḥ śrūyata ityuktaṃ tadayuktam /
GSP33brssbh2u:3639: yathā tṛtīyādhyaye caturthapādeṣvapratigraheṣvadhikaraṇapūrvapakṣanyāyo bahusūtravyavahito 'pi somavamane parāmṛśyate tadvadatrāpi jñeyam /
GSP33brssbh2u:3646: 'kasminnu bhagavo vijñāte sarvamidaṃ vijñātaṃ bhavati' (muṇḍa. 1.1.3) iti hyekavijñānena sarvavijñānaṃ pratijñāya tatsādhanāyedamāmnāyate-
GSP33brssbh2u:3648: sā ca pratijñā prāṇādeḥ samastasya jāgato brahmavikāratve sati prakṛtivyatirekeṇa vikārābhāvātsiddhyati
GSP33brssbh2u:3650: tathāca pratijñātārthamupasaṃharati- 'puruṣa evedaṃ viśvaṃ karma tapo brahma parāmṛtam' (muṇḍa. 2.2.11) iti, 'brahmaivedaṃ viśvamidaṃ variṣṭam'
GSP33brssbh2u:3652: tathā 'ātmano vā are darśanena śravaṇena matyā vijñānenedaṃ sarvaṃ
GSP33brssbh2u:3656: 'aprāṇo hyamanāḥ śubhro hyakṣarātparataḥ paraḥ' (muṇḍa, 2.1.2) iti mūlaprakṛteḥ prāṇādisamastaviśeṣarahitatvāvadhāraṇāt
GSP33brssbh2u:3657: avāntaraprakṛtiviṣayaṃ tvetatsvavavikārāpekṣaṃ pragutpatteḥ prāṇānāṃ sadbhāvāvadhāraṇamiti draṣṭavyam /
GSP33brssbh2u:3659: viyadadhikaraṇe hi 'gauṇyasaṃbhavāt' iti pūrvapakṣasūtratvādgauṇī janmaśrutirasaṃbhavāditi vyākhyātam /
GSP33brssbh2u:3662: tadanurodena tvihāpi gauṇī janmaśrutisaṃbhavāditi vyācakṣāṇaiḥ pratijñāhānirupekṣitā syāt tatprākśruteś ca |
GSP33brssbh2u:3664: yajjāyata ityekaṃ janmavācipadaṃ prāṇeṣu prākśrutaṃ saduttareṣvapyākāśādiṣvanuvartate /
GSP33brssbh2u:3667: nahyekasminprakaraṇa ekasmiṃśca vākya ekaḥ śabdaḥ sakṛduccarito bahubhiḥ saṃbadhyamānaḥ kvacinmukhyaḥ kvacidgauṇa ityadhyavasātuṃ śakyam /
GSP33brssbh2u:3669: tathā 'sa prāṇamasṛjata prāṇācchraddhām' (praśna. 6.4) ityatrāpi prāṇeṣu śrutaḥ sṛjatiḥ pareṣvapyutpattimatsu śraddhādiṣvanuṣajyate /
GSP33brssbh2u:3670: yatrāpi paścacchruta utpattivacanaḥ śabdaḥ pūrvaiḥ saṃbadhyate tatrāpyeṣa eva nyāyaḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:3671: yathā 'sarvāṇi bhūtāni vyuccaranti' ityayamante paṭhito vyuccarantiśabdaḥ
GSP33brssbh2u:3674: yadyapi 'tattejo 'sṛjata' (chā. 6.2.3) ityetasminprakaraṇe prāṇānāmutpattirna paṭhyate, tejobannānāmeva ca trayāṇāṃ
GSP33brssbh2u:3676: tathāpi brahmaprakṛtikatejobannapīrvakatvābhidhānādvākprāṇamanasāṃ tatsāmānyācca sarveṣāmeva prāṇānāṃ brahmaprabhavatvaṃ siddhaṃ bhavati /
GSP33brssbh2u:3678: 'annamayaṃ hi somya mana āpomayaḥ prāṇastejomayī vāk' (chā. 6.5.4) iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:3679: tatra yadi tāvanmukhyamevaiṣāmannādimayatvaṃ tato vartata eva brahmaprabhavatvam /
GSP33brssbh2u:3680: atha bhāktaṃ tatāpi brahmakartṛkāyāṃ nāmarūpavyākriyāyāṃ śravaṇāt
GSP33brssbh2u:3682: sarvam' (chā. 6.8.7) iti copasaṃhārācchrutyantaraprasiddheśca brahmakāryatvaprapañcanārthameva manaādīnāmannādimayatvavacanamiti gamyate
GSP33brssbh2u:3690: saṃprati tu katītare prāṇā iti saṃpradhārayati /
GSP33brssbh2u:3692: kvacitsapta prāṇāḥ saṃkīrtyante- 'sapta prāṇāḥ prabhavanti tasmāt' (muṇḍa.
GSP33brssbh2u:3694: kvaciccāṣṭau prāṇā grahatvena guṇena saṃkīrtyante- ' aṣṭau grahā aṣṭāvatigrahāḥ'' (bṛ. 3.2.1) iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:3695: kvacinnava- 'sapta vai śīrṣaṇyāḥ prāṇā dvāvavāñcau' (tai. saṃ. 5.1.7.1) iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:3697: kvaciddaśa- 'nava vai puruṣe prāṇā nābhirdaśamī' iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:3701: evaṃ hi vipratipannāḥ prāṇeyattāṃ prati śrutayaḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:3708: nanu 'prāṇā guhāśayā nihitāḥ sapta sapta' (muṇḍa. 2.1.8) iti vīpsā śrūyate, sā saptabhyo 'tiriktānprāṇāngamayati /
GSP33brssbh2u:3710: puruṣabhedābhiprāyeyaṃ vīpsā pratipuruṣaṃ sapta sapta prāṇā iti, na tattvabhedābhiprāyā sapta saptānye 'nye prāṇā iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:3711: nanvaṣṭatvādikāpi saṃkhāyā prāṇeṣūdāhṛtā kathaṃ saptaiva syuḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:3724: hastādayastvapare saptabhyo 'tiriktāḥ prāṇāḥ śrūyante- 'hastau vai grahaḥ sa karmaṇātigraheṇa gṛhīto hastābhyāṃ hi karma karoti' (bṛ. 3.2.8)
GSP33brssbh2u:3727: hīnādhikasaṃkhyāvipratipattau hyadhikā saṃkhyā saṃgrāhyā bhavati tasyāṃ hīnāntarbhavati natu hīnāyāmadhikā /
GSP33brssbh2u:3728: ataśca naivaṃ mantavyaṃ stokakalpanānurodhātsaptaiva prāṇāḥ syuriti /
GSP33brssbh2u:3730: tathā codāhṛtā śrutiḥ - 'daśeme puruṣe prāṇā ātmaikādaśaḥ' (bṛ. 3.9.4) iti
GSP33brssbh2u:3734: nanvekādaśābhyaḥ kāryajātebhyo 'dhikaṃ kāryajātamasti yadarthamadhikaṃ karaṇaṃ kalpyeta
GSP33brssbh2u:3736: vacanādānaviharaṇotsargānandāḥ pañca karmabhedāstadarthāni ca pañca karmendriyāṇi /
GSP33brssbh2u:3740: tathāca śrutiḥ kāmādyā nānāvidhā vṛttiranukramyāha- 'etatsarvaṃ mana eva'
GSP33brssbh2u:3742: apica saptaiva śīrṣaṇyānprāṇānabhimanyamānasya catvāra eva prāṇā abhimatāḥ syuḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:3743: sthānabhedāddhyete catvāraḥ santaḥ sapta gaṇyante 'dve śrotre dve cakṣuṣī
GSP33brssbh2u:3745: naca tāvatāmeva vṛttibhedā itare prāṇā iti śakyate vaktuṃ,
GSP33brssbh2u:3748: ityatrāpi dehacchidrabhedābhiprāyeṇaiva daśa prāṇā ucyante na prāṇatattvabhedābhiprāyeṇa /
GSP33brssbh2u:3751: mukhyasya tu prāṇasya bhavati nābhirapyekaṃ viśeṣāyatanamityato nābhirdaśamītyucyate /
GSP33brssbh2u:3753: tadevaṃ vicitre prāṇeyattāmnāne sati kva kiṃparamāmnānamiti vivektavyam /
GSP33brssbh2u:3756: saptaiva prāṇāḥ syuryataḥ saptānāmeva gatiḥ śrūyate- 'tamutkrāmantaṃ prāṇo
GSP33brssbh2u:3758: nanu sarvaśabdo 'pyatra paṭhyate, tatkathaṃ saptanāmeva gatiḥ pratijñāyata iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:3760: saptaiva hi prāṇāścakṣurādayastvakparyantā viśeṣitā iha prakṛtāḥ 'sa
GSP33brssbh2u:3763: prakṛtagāmī ca sarvaśabdo bhavati yathā sarve brāhmaṇā bhojayitavyā iti ye nimantritāḥ prakṛtā brāhmaṇāsta eva sarvaśabdenocyante nānye /
GSP33brssbh2u:3764: evamihāpi ye prakṛtāḥ sapta prāṇāsta eva sarvaśabdenocyante nānya iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:3773: sa ca kṣetrajño naikasminneva śarīre badhyate, śarīrāntareṣvi tulyatvādbandhanasya /
GSP33brssbh2u:3775: tathāca smṛtiḥ - puryaṣṭakena liṅgena prāṇādyena sa yujyate /
GSP33brssbh2u:3776: tena baddhasya vai bandho mokṣo muktasya tena ca /
GSP33brssbh2u:3778: ātharvaṇe ca viṣayendriyānukramaṇe cakṣuṣa draṣṭavyaṃ ca ityatra tulyavaddhastādīnīndriyāṇi saviṣayāṇyanukrāmati-' hastau cādātavyaṃ copasthaścānandayitavyaṃ ca pāyuśca visarjayitavyaṃ ca pādau ca gantavyaṃ ca' ( pra. 4.8) iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:3783: sarvaśabdo 'pi ca prāṇaśabdena saṃbadhyamāno 'śeṣānprāṇānabhidadhāno na prakaraṇavaśena saptasvevāvasthāpayituṃ śakyate, prakaraṇācchabdasya balīyastvāt /
GSP33brssbh2u:3784: sarve brāhmaṇā bhojayitavyā ityatrāpi sarveṣāmevāvanivartināṃ brāhmaṇānāṃ grahaṇaṃ nyāyyaṃ, sarvaśabdasāmarthyāt /
GSP33brssbh2u:3790: FN: guhāyāṃ hṛdaye śerata iti guhāśayāḥ svastāneṣu nihitāḥ nikṣiptāḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:3795: prāṇādipañcakaṃ bhūtasūkṣmapañcakaṃ jñānendriyapañcakaṃ karmendriyapañcakaṃ antaḥkaraṇacatuṣṭayaṃ avidyā kāmaḥ karma ceti paryuṣṭakam /
GSP33brssbh2u:3803: sūkṣmā ete prāṇāḥ sthūlāścetsyurmaraṇakāle śarīrānnirgacchanto bilādahirivopalabhyeranmriyamāṇasya pārśvasthaiḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:3808: yadeva hyupalabdhisādhanaṃ vṛttiranyadvā tasyaiva naḥ karaṇatvaṃ saṃjñāmātre vivāda iti karaṇānāṃ vyāpitvakalpanā nirarthikā /
GSP33brssbh2u:3817: 'etasmājjāyate prāṇo manaḥ sarvendriyāṇi ca' (muṇḍa. 2.1.3) iti sendriyamanovyatirekeṇa prāṇasyotpattiśravaṇāt
GSP33brssbh2u:3821: nāsadāsīye hi brahmapradhāne sūkte mantravarṇo bhavati 'na
GSP33brssbh2u:3822: mṛtyurāsīdamṛtaṃ na tarhi na rātryā ahnu āsītpraketaḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:3823: ānīdavātaṃ svadhayā tadekaṃ tasmāddhānyanna paraḥ kiñcanāsa' (ṛ.saṃ.
GSP33brssbh2u:3833: śreṣṭha iti ca mukhyaṃ prāṇamabhidadhāti- 'prāṇo vāva jyeṣṭhaśca śreṣṭhaśca' (chā. 5.1.1) iti śrutinirdeśāt /
GSP33brssbh2u:3835: na cetasya tadānīṃ vṛttilābhaḥ syādyonau niṣiktaṃ śukraṃ pūyeta na saṃbhavedvā /
GSP33brssbh2u:3837: śreṣṭhaśca prāṇo guṇādhikyāt, 'na vai śakṣyāmastvadṛte jīvitum' (bṛ.
GSP33brssbh2u:3839: FN: tarhi tadā pralayakāle mṛtyurmārako mṛtyumatkāryaṃ vā nāsīt, amṛtaṃ devabhogyaṃ nāsīt, rātryāḥ praketaścihnarūpaścandraḥ ahaḥ praketaḥ sūryaśca nāstāṃ, svadhayā pitṛdeyāgnena saha, ānīt ceṣṭāṃ kṛtavat /
GSP33brssbh2u:3843: sa punarmukhyaḥ prāṇaḥ kiṃsvarūpa itīdānīṃ jijñāsyate /
GSP33brssbh2u:3845: evaṃ hi śrūyate- 'yaḥ prāṇaḥ sa vāyuḥ sa eṣa vāyuḥ pañcavidhaḥ prāṇo 'pāno
GSP33brssbh2u:3848: evaṃ hi tantrāntarīyā ācakṣate- 'sāmānyā karaṇavṛttiḥ prāṇādyā vāyavaḥ
GSP33brssbh2u:3850: atrocyate- na vāyuḥ prāṇo nāpi karaṇavyāpāraḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:3852: vāyostāvatprāṇasya pṛthagupadeśo bhavati- 'prāṇa eva brahmaṇaścaścaturthaḥ pādaḥ sa vāyunā jyotiṣā bhāti ca tapati ca' (chāndo. 3.18.4) iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:3854: tathā karaṇavṛtterapi pṛthagupadeśo bhavati, vāgādīni karaṇānyanukramya tatra tatra pṛthakprāṇasyānukramaṇāt
GSP33brssbh2u:3856: nahi karaṇavyāpāra eva san karaṇebhyaḥ pṛthagupadiśyeta /
GSP33brssbh2u:3858: khaṃ vāyuḥ' (mu. 2.1.3) ityevamādayo 'pi vāyoḥ karaṇebhyaśca prāṇasya
GSP33brssbh2u:3863: yathaitapañjaravartina ekādaśapakṣiṇaḥ pratyekaṃ pratiniyatavyāpārāḥ santaḥ saṃbhūyaikaṃ pañjaraṃ cālayanti, evamekaśarīravartina ekādaśa prāṇāḥ pratyekaṃ pratiniyatavṛttayaḥ santaḥ saṃbhūyaikāṃ prāṇākhyāṃ vṛttiṃ pratilapsyanta iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:3865: yuktaṃ tatra pratyekavṛttibhiravāntaravyāpāraiḥ pañjaracālanānurūpairevopetāḥ pakṣiṇaḥ saṃbhūyaikaṃ pañjaraṃ cālayeyuriti /
GSP33brssbh2u:3867: iha tu śravaṇādyavāntaravyāpāropetāḥ prāṇa na saṃbhūya prāṇyuriti yuktam,
GSP33brssbh2u:3870: tathā prāṇasya śreṣṭhatvādyudghoṣaṇaṃ guṇabhāvopagamaśca taṃ prati
GSP33brssbh2u:3873: kathaṃ tarhīyaṃ śrutiḥ 'yaḥ prāṇaḥ sa vāyuḥ' iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:3875: prāṇo nāma bhaṇyate na tattvāntaraṃ nāpi vāyumātram /
GSP33brssbh2u:3880: tathāhyanekavidhā vibhūtiḥ prāṇasya śrāvyate- 'supteṣu vāgādiṣu prāṇa eko
GSP33brssbh2u:3881: hi jāgarti prāṇa eko mṛtyunānāptaḥ prāṇaḥ saṃvargo vāgādīnsaṃvṛṅ kte prāṇa itarānprāṇānrakṣati māteva putrān' iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:3886: yathā cakṣurādīni rājaprakṛtivajjīvasya kartṛtvaṃ bhoktṛtvaṃ ca pratyupakaraṇāni na svatantrāṇi
GSP33brssbh2u:3887: tathā mukhyo 'pi prāṇo rājamantrivajjīvasya sarvārthakaratvenopakaraṇabhūto na svatantraḥ
GSP33brssbh2u:3891: samānadharmāṇāṃ ca saha śāsanaṃ yuktaṃ bṛhadrathantarādivat /
GSP33brssbh2u:3894: yadi cakṣurādivatprāṇasya jīvaṃ prati karaṇabhāvo 'bhāyupagamyeta,viṣayāntaraṃ rūpādivatprasajyeta
GSP33brssbh2u:3895: rūpādyālocanādibhirvṛttibhiryathāsvaṃ cakṣurādīnāṃ jīvaṃ prati karaṇabhāvo bhavati /
GSP33brssbh2u:3896: apicaikādaśaiva kāryajātāni rūpālocanādīni parigaṇitāni yadarthamekādaśa prāṇāḥ saṃgṛhītāḥ natu dvādaśamaparaṃ kāryajātamadhigamyate yadarthamayaṃ dvādaśaḥ prāṇaḥ pratijñāyeteti /
GSP33brssbh2u:3898: akaraṇatvāc ca na doṣas tathā hi darśayati |
GSP33brssbh2u:3904: tathāhi śrutiḥ prāṇāntareṣvasaṃbhāvyamānaṃ mukhyaprāṇasya vaiśeṣikaṃ kāryaṃ darśayati prāṇasaṃvādādiṣu- 'atha ha prāṇā ahaṃśreyasi vyūdire'
GSP33brssbh2u:3905: ityupakramya 'yasminva utkrānte śarīraṃ pāpiṣṭhataramiva dṛśyate sa vaḥ
GSP33brssbh2u:3906: śreṣṭhaḥ' (chā. 5.1.6,7) iti copanyasya pratyekaṃ vāgādyutkramaṇena tadvṛttimātrahīnaṃ yathāpūrvaṃ jīvanaṃ darśayitvā prāṇoccikramiṣāyāṃ
GSP33brssbh2u:3907: vāgādiśaithilyāpattiṃ śarīrapātaprasaṅgaṃ ca darśayantī śrutiḥ prāṇanimittāṃ śarīrendriyasthitiṃ darśayati /
GSP33brssbh2u:3908: 'tāvanvariṣṭhaḥ prāṇa uvāca mā mohamāpadyathāhamevaitatpañcadhātmānaṃ pravibhajyaitadbāṇamavaṣṭabhya vidhārayāmi, iti caitamevārthaṃ śrutirāha-
GSP33brssbh2u:3910: 4.3.12) iti ca supteṣu cakṣurādiṣu prāṇanimittāṃ śarīrarakṣāṃ darśayati /
GSP33brssbh2u:3912: 'tena yadaśnāti yatpibati tenetarānprāṇānavati' iti ca prāṇanimittāṃ
GSP33brssbh2u:3915: pratiṣṭhāsyāmi' iti, 'sa prāṇamasṛjata' iti ca prāṇanimitte
GSP33brssbh2u:3917: FN: ahaṃśreyasi svasya śreṣṭhatānimittaṃ, vyūdire vivādaṃ cakrire /
GSP33brssbh2u:3920: itaścāsti mukhyasya prāṇasya vaiśeṣikaṃ kāryaṃ, yatkāraṇaṃ pañcavṛttirayaṃ vyapadiśyate śrutiṣu 'prāṇo 'pāno vyāna udānaḥ samānaḥ' (bṛ. 1.5.3) iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:3928: yathā manasaḥ pañca vṛttaya evaṃ prāṇasyāpītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:3929: śrotrādinimittāḥ śabdādiviṣayā manasaḥ pañca vṛttayaḥ prasiddhāḥ, natu kāmaḥ saṃkalpaḥ ityādyāḥ paripaṭhitāḥ parigṛhyeran /
GSP33brssbh2u:3931: nanvatrāpi śrotrādinirapekṣā bhūtabhaviṣyadādiviṣayāparā manaso vṛttirastīti samānaḥ pañcasaṃkhyātirekaḥ
GSP33brssbh2u:3932: evaṃ tarhi 'paramatamapratiṣiddhamanumataṃ bhavati' iti nyāyādihāpi yogaśāstraprasiddhā manasaḥ pañcavṛttayaḥ parigṛhyante
GSP33brssbh2u:3934: bahuvṛttitvamātreṇa vā manaḥ prāṇasya nidarśanamiti draṣṭavyam /
GSP33brssbh2u:3936: FN: pramāṇaṃ pramitiḥ, viparyayo bhramaḥ, śabdajñānānupātī vastuśūnyo vikalpaḥ, tāmasī vṛttirnidrā /
GSP33brssbh2u:3945: nanu vibhutvamapi prāṇasya samāmnāyate- 'samaḥ pluṣiṇā samo maśakena samo nāgena sama ebhistribhirlokaiḥ samo 'nena sarveṇa (bṛ. 1.3.22)
GSP33brssbh2u:3949: apica samaḥ pluṣiṇetyādinā sāmyavacanena pratiprāṇivartinaḥ prāṇasya pariccheda eva pradarśyate tasmādadoṣaḥ // 13 //
GSP33brssbh2u:3950: FN: pluṣirmaśakādapi sūkṣmo jantuḥ, nāgo hastī /
GSP33brssbh2u:3954: te punaḥ prakṛtāḥ prāṇāḥ kiṃ svamahimnaiva svasmai kāryāya prabhavantyāhosviddevatādhiṣṭhitāḥ prabhavantīti vicāryate- tatra prāptaṃ tāvadyathā svakāryaśaktiyogātsvamahimnaiva prāṇāḥ pravarteranniti /
GSP33brssbh2u:3955: apica devatādhiṣṭhitānāṃ prāṇānāṃ pravṛttāvabhyupagamyamānāyāṃ tāsāmevādhiṣṭhātrīṇāṃ devatānāṃ bhoktṛtvaprasaṅgāccharīrasya bhoktṛtvaṃ pralīyeta /
GSP33brssbh2u:3957: evaṃ prāptaṃ idamucyate- jyotirādyadhiṣṭhānaṃ tu iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:3959: jyotirādibhiragnyādyabhimāninībhirdevatābhiradhiṣṭhitaṃ vāgādi karaṇajātaṃ svakāryeṣu pravartata iti pratijānīte /
GSP33brssbh2u:3963: nahi devatāsaṃbandhaṃ pratyākhyāyāgnervāci mukhe vā kaścidviśeṣasaṃbandho dṛśyate /
GSP33brssbh2u:3964: tathā 'vāyuḥ prāṇo bhūtvā nāsike prāviśat' (aita. 2.4) ityevamādyapi yaujayitavyam /
GSP33brssbh2u:3965: tathānyatrāpi vāgeva brahmaṇaścaturthaḥ pādaḥ so 'gninā jyotiṣā bhāti ca
GSP33brssbh2u:3967: 'sa vai vācameva prathamāmatyavahatsā yadā mṛtyumatyamucyata so
GSP33brssbh2u:3979: sa prāṇo vācaṃ prathamāmudgīthakarmāṇi pradhānāṃ anṛtādipāpmarūpaṃ mṛtyumatītyāvahanmṛtyunā muktāṃ kṛtvā agnidevatātmatvaṃ prāpitavān /
GSP33brssbh2u:3980: yadapyuktaṃ devatānāmevādhiṣṭhātrīṇāṃ bhoktṛtvaprasaṅgo na śārīrasyeti tatparihriyate-
GSP33brssbh2u:3982: satīṣvapi prāṇānāmadhiṣṭātrīṣu devatāsu prāṇavatā kāryakaraṇasaṃghātasvāminā śārīreṇaivaiṣāṃ prāṇānāṃ saṃbandhaḥ śruteravagamyate /
GSP33brssbh2u:3983: tathāhi śrutiḥ - 'atha yatraitadākāśamanuviṣaṇṇaṃ cakṣuḥ sa cākṣuṣaḥ puruṣo darśanāya takṣuratha yo vededaṃ jighrāṇīti sa ātmā gandhāya
GSP33brssbh2u:3984: ghrāṇam' (chā. 8.124) ityevañjātīyakā śārīreṇaiva prāṇānāṃ saṃbandhaṃ śrāvayati /
GSP33brssbh2u:3988: FN: atha dehe prāgapraveśānantaraṃ yatra golake etacchidramanupraviṣṭaṃ
GSP33brssbh2u:3989: cakṣurindriyaṃ tatra cakṣuṣyabhimānī sa ātmā cākṣuṣaḥ tasya rūpadarśanāya cakṣuḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:3991: tasya ca śārīrasyāsmiñśarīre bhoktṛtvena nityatvena puṇyapāpopalepasaṃbhavātsukhaduḥkhopabhogasaṃbhavācca na devatānām /
GSP33brssbh2u:3992: tā hi parasminnaiśvarye pade 'vatiṣṭhamānā na hine 'smiñśarīre bhoktṛtvaṃ pratilabdhumarhanti
GSP33brssbh2u:3993: śrutiśca bhavati- 'puṇyamevāmuṃ gacchati na ha vai devānpāpaṃ gacchati'
GSP33brssbh2u:3994: (bṛ. 1.5.3) iti śārīreṇaiva ca nityaḥ prāṇānāṃ saṃbandha utkrāntyādiṣu tadanuvṛttidarśanāt
GSP33brssbh2u:3998: tasmātsatīṣvapi karaṇānāṃ niyantrīṣu devatāsu na śārīrasya bhoktṛtvamapagacchati /
GSP33brssbh2u:4005: kiṃ mukhyasyaiva prāṇasya vṛttibhedā itare prāṇā āhosvittattvāntarāṇīti /
GSP33brssbh2u:4009: khyāpayati- 'hantāsyaiva sarve rūpamasāmeti ta etasyaiva sarve rūpamabhavan' (bṛ. 1.5.21) iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:4013: tasmādyathaikasyaiva prāṇasya prāṇādyāḥ pañca vṛttaya evaṃ vāgādyā apyekādaśeti /
GSP33brssbh2u:4018: te prakṛtāḥ prāṇāḥ śreṣṭhaṃ varjayitvāvaśiṣṭā ekādaśenjadriyāṇītyucyante /
GSP33brssbh2u:4020: 'etasmājjāyate prāṇo manaḥ sarvendriyāṇi ca' (mu. 2.1.3) iti hyevañjātīyakeṣu pradeśeṣu pṛthakprāṇo vyapadiśyate pṛthaktcendriyāṇi /
GSP33brssbh2u:4025: prāṇasya tvindriyatvaṃ na śrutau smṛtau vā prasiddhamasti /
GSP33brssbh2u:4027: tattvaikatve tu sa evaikaḥ sanprāṇa indriyavyapadeśaṃ labhate na labhate ceti vipratiṣiddham
GSP33brssbh2u:4029: FN: asyaiva mukhyaprāṇasya rūpaṃ asāma bhavemeti saṃkalpya, te vāgādayaḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:4032: bhedena vāgādibhyaḥ prāṇaḥ sarvatra śrūyate- 'te ha vācamūcuḥ' (bṛ. 1.3.2)
GSP33brssbh2u:4033: ityupakramya vāgādīnasurapāpmavidhvastānupanyasyopasaṃhṛtya vāgādiprakaraṇam 'atha hemamāsanyaṃ prāṇamūcuḥ' ityasuravidhvaṃsino mukhyasya prāṇasya pṛthagupakramāt /
GSP33brssbh2u:4034: tathā 'mano vācaṃ prāṇaṃ tānyātmane 'kuruta' ityevamādyā api bhedaśrutaya
GSP33brssbh2u:4040: suṣupteṣu vāgādiṣu mukhya eko jāgarti sa eva caiko mṛtyunānāpta āptāstvitare /
GSP33brssbh2u:4042: viṣayālocanahetutvaṃ cendriyāṇāṃ na prāṇasyevañjātīyako bhūyāllakṣaṇabhedaḥ prāṇendriyāṇām
GSP33brssbh2u:4044: yaduktam- 'ta etasyaiva sarve rūpamabhavan' (bṛ. 1.5.21) iti śruteḥ prāṇa
GSP33brssbh2u:4047: tathāhi- vadiṣyāmyevāhamiti vāgdadhre' (bṛ. 1.5.21) iti vāgādīnīndriyāṇyanukramya 'tāni mṛtyuḥ śramo bhūtvopayeme
GSP33brssbh2u:4048: tasmācchrāmyatyeva vāk' iti ca śramarūpeṇa mṛtyunā grastatvaṃ vāgādīnāmabhidhāya 'athemameva nāpnodyo 'yaṃ madhyamaḥ prāṇaḥ' (bṛ.
GSP33brssbh2u:4050: 'ayaṃ vai naḥ śreṣṭhaḥ' (bṛ. 1.5.21) iti ca śreṣṭhatāmasyāvadhārayati /
GSP33brssbh2u:4051: tasmāttadavirodhena vāgādiṣu parispandalābhasya prāṇāyattatvaṃ tadrūpabhavanaṃ vāgādīnāmiti mantavyaṃ na tādātmyam /
GSP33brssbh2u:4054: tasmādeta etenākhyāyante prāṇāḥ' (bṛ. 1.5.21) iti mukhyaprāṇaviṣayasyaiva prāṇaśabdasyendriyeṣu lākṣaṇikīṃ vṛttiṃ darśayati /
GSP33brssbh2u:4061: satprakriyāyāṃ tejobannānāṃ sṛṣṭimabhidhāyopadiśyate- 'seyaṃ devataikṣata hantāhamimāstisro devatā anena jīvenātmanānupraviśya nāmarūpe
GSP33brssbh2u:4067: yathā loke cāreṇāhaṃ parasainyamanupraviśya saṃkalayānītyevañjātīyake prayoge cārakartṛkameva satsainyasaṃkalanaṃ hetukartṛtvādrājātmanyadhyāropayati saṃkalayānītyuttamapuruṣaprayogeṇa,
GSP33brssbh2u:4069: apica ḍitthaḍavitthādiṣu nāmasu ghaṭaśarāvādiṣu ca rūpeṣu jīvasyaiva vyākartṛtvaṃ dṛṣṭam /
GSP33brssbh2u:4074: trivṛtkurvata iti parameśvaraṃ lakṣayati, trivṛtkaraṇe tasya nirapavādakartṛtvanirdeśāt
GSP33brssbh2u:4075: yeyaṃ saṃjñākḷptimūrtikḷptiścāgnirādityaścandramā vidyuditi, tathā kuśakāśapalāśādiṣu paśumṛgamanuṣyādiṣu ca pratyākṛti prativyakti
GSP33brssbh2u:4077: sā khalu parameśvarasyaiva tejobannānāṃ nirmātuḥ kṛtirbhavitumarhati /
GSP33brssbh2u:4084: tena hi saṃbandhe vyākaravāṇītyayaṃ devatāviṣaya uttamapuruṣa aupacārikaḥ kalpyeta /
GSP33brssbh2u:4085: naca girinadīsamudrādiṣu nānāvidheṣu nāmarūpeṣvanīśvarasya jīvasya vyākaraṇasāmarthyamasti
GSP33brssbh2u:4086: yeṣvapi cāsti sāmarthyaṃ teṣvapi parameśvarāyattameva tat /
GSP33brssbh2u:4087: naca jīvo nāma parameśvarādatyantabhinnaścāra iva rājñaḥ, ātmaneti viśeṣaṇāt /
GSP33brssbh2u:4093: trivṛtkaraṇapūrvakamevedamiha nāmarūpavyākaraṇaṃ vivakṣyate, pratyekaṃ nāmarūpavyākaraṇasya tejobannotpattivacanenaivoktatvāt /
GSP33brssbh2u:4095: rohitaṃ rūpaṃ tejasastadrūpaṃ yacchuklaṃ tadapāṃ yatkṛṣṇaṃ tadannasya'
GSP33brssbh2u:4098: sati ca rūpavyākaraṇe viṣayapratilambhādagniritīdaṃ nāma vyākriyate /
GSP33brssbh2u:4100: anena cāgnyādyudāharaṇena bhaumāmbhasataijaseṣu triṣvapi dravyeṣvaviśeṣeṇa trivṛtkaraṇamuktaṃ bhavati /
GSP33brssbh2u:4108: tāsāṃ tisṛṇāmekaikāṃ devatāṃ tejobannātmanā tryātmikāṃ kariṣyāmīti śrutiḥ pañcīkaraṇopalakṣaṇārthā
GSP33brssbh2u:4109: tāsāṃ tisṛṇāṃ devatānāṃ bahistrivṛtkṛtānāṃ satīnāmadhyātmamaparaṃ trivṛtkaraṇamuktam- 'imāstisro devatāḥ puruṣaṃ prāpya trivṛttrivṛdekaikā
GSP33brssbh2u:4115: tathāhi śrutiḥ - 'annamaśitaṃ tredhā vidhīyate tasya yaḥ sthaviṣṭho dhātustatpurīṣaṃ bhavati yo madhyamastanmāṃsaṃ yo 'ṇiṣṭhastanmanaḥ' (chā.
GSP33brssbh2u:4126: kiṅkṛtastarhyayaṃ viśeṣavyapadeśaḥ 'idaṃ teja imā āpa idamannam' iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:4138: vyavahāraśca trivṛtkṛtarajjuvadekatvāpattau satyāṃ na bhedena bhūtatrayagocaro lokasya prasiddhyet
GSP33brssbh2u:4139: tasmātsatyapi trivṛtkaraṇe vaiśeṣyādeva tejobannaviśeṣavādo bhūtabhautikaviṣaya upapadyate
